analyzed: de ltar rnam pa gnyis de'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir gcig la gzung ba na rnam pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin bzung ba med do //
translated: Thus, because the two aspects are of the nature of that, when one is grasped, the nature of all aspects is not grasped.

original: gang gis de bzung bas gsal ba gzhan yang bzung bar thal ba gsal ba gzhan dang gsal ba @20b gzhan gyi lhan cig de'i bdag nyid ji ltar yin zhe na brgyud pas zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gang gis de bzung bas gsal ba gzhan yang bzung bar thal ba gsal ba gzhan dang gsal ba @20b gzhan gyi lhan cig de'i bdag nyid ji ltar yin zhe na brgyud pas zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Since that is grasped, it follows that another manifest thing is also grasped. How can another manifest thing be of the nature of that? It is through a causal process.

original: rnam pa dang ni rnam pa gzhan dngos su de'i bdag nyid yin la /
analyzed: rnam pa dang ni rnam pa gzhan dngos su de'i bdag nyid yin la /
translated: The aspect and another aspect are directly of the nature of that.

original: rnam pa gzhan ni gsal ba dang gcig dang de'i bdag nyid yin pan gsal ba rang yang yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan ni gsal ba dang gcig dang de'i bdag nyid yin pan gsal ba rang yang yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: But another aspect is of the nature of the same entity as the manifest thing, so the manifest thing itself would also be that.

original: des na brgyud nas rnam pa dang ldan pa gzhan yang rnam pa dang ldan pa gzhan dang de'i bdag nyid yin la de ltar na rnam pa bzung ba na rnam pa dang ldan pa gzhan bzung bar thal lo zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: des na brgyud nas rnam pa dang ldan pa gzhan yang rnam pa dang ldan pa gzhan dang de'i bdag nyid yin la de ltar na rnam pa bzung ba na rnam pa dang ldan pa gzhan bzung bar thal lo zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Therefore, the other possessing aspects is indirectly the other possessing aspects, and it is the nature of that. Thus, when the aspect is apprehended, it follows that the other possessing aspects is apprehended.

original: phyed snga ma 'chad pa ni rnam pa gzhan ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: phyed snga ma 'chad pa ni rnam pa gzhan ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The meaning of the first half is explained as ‚Äúthe other aspect.‚Äù

original: phyed phyi ma rnam par 'grel pa ni rnam pa gzhan de zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: phyed phyi ma rnam par 'grel pa ni rnam pa gzhan de zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The latter half is commented on as ‚Äúthat other aspect.‚Äù

original: de dang tha mi dad pa'i zhes bya ba ni rnam pa dang tha mi dad pa'i'o //
analyzed: de dang tha mi dad pa'i zhes bya ba ni rnam pa dang tha mi dad pa'i'o //
translated: ‚ÄúNot different from that‚Äù means not different from the aspect.

original: de'i tshe rnam pa gzhan bzung yang de las gzhan zhes bya ba la gsal ba gzhan la gnas pa'i rnam pa gzhan 'dzin par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i tshe rnam pa gzhan bzung yang de las gzhan zhes bya ba la gsal ba gzhan la gnas pa'i rnam pa gzhan 'dzin par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: At that time, even if the other aspect is apprehended, it is not the apprehension of the other aspect that abides in the other clear form called ‚Äúother.‚Äù

original: 'on te de'i bdag nyid kho nas 'dzin pa yin no snyam na tha mi dad pa ni zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: 'on te de'i bdag nyid kho nas 'dzin pa yin no snyam na tha mi dad pa ni zhes gsungs so //
translated: But if you think that it is apprehended just by being of the same nature, then ‚Äúnon-different‚Äù is stated.

original: tha mi dad pa yin yang khyed kyi lugs kyis de 'dzin pa na de 'dzin pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: tha mi dad pa yin yang khyed kyi lugs kyis de 'dzin pa na de 'dzin pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Although they are not different, in your system, when one apprehends the one, one does not apprehend the other.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rnam pa dang ldan pa gzhan zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rnam pa dang ldan pa gzhan zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is called ‚Äúendowed with an aspect.‚Äù

original: rnam pa bzung ba na de dang tha dad med pa'i rnam pa dang ldan pa chod pa 'dzin par 'dod pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa bzung ba na de dang tha dad med pa'i rnam pa dang ldan pa chod pa 'dzin par 'dod pa ni ma yin no //
translated: When the aspect is apprehended, one does not assert that one apprehends the object endowed with the aspect that is not different from it.

original: des na rnam pa gcig bzung yang gzhan bzung ba nyid du mi 'gyur ro ;
analyzed: des na rnam pa gcig bzung yang gzhan bzung ba nyid du mi 'gyur ro ;
translated: Therefore, even though one aspect is apprehended, the other is not apprehended.

original: /'on te zhes bya ba ni dogs pa bsu ba'o //üîΩde dang zhes bya ba rnam pa snga ma dang rnam pa gzhan tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: /'on te zhes bya ba ni dogs pa bsu ba'o // de dang zhes bya ba rnam pa snga ma dang rnam pa gzhan tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúBut‚Äù introduces a doubt.üîΩ‚ÄúThat‚Äù refers to the previous aspect.

original: de zhes bya ba ni yul la sogs pas chod pa'i gsal ba gzhan la gnas ba'o //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni yul la sogs pas chod pa'i gsal ba gzhan la gnas ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThat‚Äù refers to the other object that is obstructed by an object and so on.

original: de ltar na ni zhes bya ba ni lan no //
analyzed: de ltar na ni zhes bya ba ni lan no //
translated: ‚ÄúIn that case‚Äù is the response.

original: rnam pa tha mi dad pa ni rnam pa dang ldan pa las tha dad pa ma yin pa'i phyir rnam pa dang ldan pa yang tha dad par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam pa tha mi dad pa ni rnam pa dang ldan pa las tha dad pa ma yin pa'i phyir rnam pa dang ldan pa yang tha dad par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Since the aspect is not different from the object endowed with the aspect, the object endowed with the aspect also would not be different.

original: tha mi dad pa las tha mi dad pa ni tha dad par 'gyur ba mi 'os so //
analyzed: tha mi dad pa las tha mi dad pa ni tha dad par 'gyur ba mi 'os so //
translated: A non-difference from a difference is not suitable as a difference.

original: 'dis ni zhes bya ba ni rnam pa dang ldan pa tha mi dad par thal bas ni'o //
analyzed: 'dis ni zhes bya ba ni rnam pa dang ldan pa tha mi dad par thal bas ni'o //
translated: This is what is said: because of the consequence of the non-difference of the possessor of the aspects.

original: rnam par bshad pa byed pa ni ri khrod rje'o //
analyzed: rnam par bshad pa byed pa ni ri khrod rje'o //
translated: The commentator is the forest-dwelling lord.

original: rnam par bshad pa'i tshig gang zhe na /
analyzed: rnam par bshad pa'i tshig gang zhe na /
translated: What is the explanation?

original: gcig la zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gcig la zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: It is the statement beginning with ‚Äúin one.‚Äù

original: yang ci ltar na 'di spangs she na /
analyzed: yang ci ltar na 'di spangs she na /
translated: Moreover, how is this abandoned?

original: rnam pa zhes gsungs so //üîΩrnam pa tha dad pa med pa'i phyir rnam pa de dang tha dad pa med pa ni gsal ba gzhan nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: rnam pa zhes gsungs so // rnam pa tha dad pa med pa'i phyir rnam pa de dang tha dad pa med pa ni gsal ba gzhan nyid ma yin te /
translated: The aspects are stated.

original: spyi'i rang bzhin du gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: spyi'i rang bzhin du gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the aspects are not different, that which is not different from those aspects is not another manifestation, because it has become the nature of the universal.

original: rnam pa gzhan bzhin no zhes bya @21a * //
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan bzhin no zhes bya @21a * //
translated: Like another aspect.

original: ba ni ; dper na khra bo la gnas pa'i rnam pa las ser skya la gnas pa'i rnam pa tha mi dad pa de bzhin du'o //
analyzed: ba ni ; dper na khra bo la gnas pa'i rnam pa las ser skya la gnas pa'i rnam pa tha mi dad pa de bzhin du'o //
translated: For example, like the aspect that resides in a multicolored object from the aspect that resides in a pale yellow object.

original: 'on te zhes bya ba ni rtsod pa'o //
analyzed: 'on te zhes bya ba ni rtsod pa'o //
translated: But if, it is a dispute.

original: gsal ba ni yon tan la sogs pa'i dbye bas de dang ldan pa'i gsal ba tha dad pa'i phyir tha dad par 'thad kyi rnam ba ni gzhan ma yin te /
analyzed: gsal ba ni yon tan la sogs pa'i dbye bas de dang ldan pa'i gsal ba tha dad pa'i phyir tha dad par 'thad kyi rnam ba ni gzhan ma yin te /
translated: Since the manifest is differentiated by the divisions of qualities and so on, it is tenable that it is different. But the aspect is not different.

original: yon tan la sogs pa'i dbye bas rnam pa du ma nyid du 'gyur ba ma yin pas te /
analyzed: yon tan la sogs pa'i dbye bas rnam pa du ma nyid du 'gyur ba ma yin pas te /
translated: Since the manifestation of a pot, etc. is different from the manifestation of a cloth, etc. because of the difference of the manifestation endowed with the divisions of quality, etc., it is reasonable that it is different. But the form is not different, because the form does not become manifold by the divisions of quality, etc.

original: de ni yon tan la sogs pa dang bral ba'i phyir ro zhen /
analyzed: de ni yon tan la sogs pa dang bral ba'i phyir ro zhen /
translated: For that is devoid of quality, etc.

original: de ni ma yin te zhes bya bar grub pa'i mtha' byed pa'o //
analyzed: de ni ma yin te zhes bya bar grub pa'i mtha' byed pa'o //
translated: That is not so, as the conclusion is drawn.

original: nag po la sogs pa gsal ba 'byed par byed pa de tha dad pa'am /
analyzed: nag po la sogs pa gsal ba 'byed par byed pa de tha dad pa'am /
translated: Is the manifestation of a black, etc. color that which differentiates it different or not different?

original: tha mi dad pa zhig yin de la re zhig phyogs dang po sel ba ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: tha mi dad pa zhig yin de la re zhig phyogs dang po sel ba ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: First, the refutation of the first possibility is stated: If it is different,

original: de zhes bya ba nag po la sogs pa tha dad bsags la bas tha dad pa gang las yin /
analyzed: de zhes bya ba nag po la sogs pa tha dad bsags la bas tha dad pa gang las yin /
translated: from what is the difference of the manifestation of black, etc. that is different from the accumulation of different atoms?

original: dper na nor bu tha dad pas te tha dad ba ma yin pa de bzhin du nag po la sogs pa'i don gzhan tha dad pas gsal ba tha dad pa ma yin no //
analyzed: dper na nor bu tha dad pas te tha dad ba ma yin pa de bzhin du nag po la sogs pa'i don gzhan tha dad pas gsal ba tha dad pa ma yin no //
translated: Just as the manifestation is not different because of the difference of the other object, black, etc., like the difference of different jewels.

original: de dang zhes bya ba yon tan la sogs pa dang 'brel pas /
analyzed: de dang zhes bya ba yon tan la sogs pa dang 'brel pas /
translated: ‚ÄúAnd that‚Äù refers to the connection with the qualities, etc.

original: gal te gsal ba tha dad na de'i tshe rnam pa la'ang tha dad pa der ci ste mi 'dod de /
analyzed: gal te gsal ba tha dad na de'i tshe rnam pa la'ang tha dad pa der ci ste mi 'dod de /
translated: If the manifestation is different, then why not accept that the aspects are also different?

original: rnam ba la de dang 'brel ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam ba la de dang 'brel ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they are connected with that.

original: gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rnam bar 'grel pa'o //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rnam bar 'grel pa'o //
translated: The commentary explains ‚Äúif‚Äù and so on.

original: de zhes bya ba nag po nyid la sogs ba tha dad pas so //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba nag po nyid la sogs ba tha dad pas so //
translated: ‚ÄúThat‚Äù refers to the differences of blackness, etc.

original: rgyu ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: rgyu ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: gzhan zhes bya ba smos te yon tan la sogs pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: gzhan zhes bya ba smos te yon tan la sogs pa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: It says ‚Äúother,‚Äù which is the nature of the qualities, etc.

original: gzhan ni gsal ba'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: gzhan ni gsal ba'i rang bzhin no //
translated: The other is the nature of the manifestation.

original: rgyu nyid kyi zhes bya ba ni dogs pa bsu ba'o //
analyzed: rgyu nyid kyi zhes bya ba ni dogs pa bsu ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúBecause of the cause‚Äù is an anticipation of an objection.

original: gzhan tha dad pa ni rgyu nyid kyis gzhan tha dad par byed pa yin no zhe na /üîΩlan du ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan tha dad pa ni rgyu nyid kyis gzhan tha dad par byed pa yin no zhe na / lan du ma yin te /
translated: ‚ÄúThe other‚Äù is the cause of the difference.

original: bya ba ste /
analyzed: bya ba ste /
translated: The reply is ‚ÄúNo, because of the action.‚ÄùüîΩBecause of the action, the cause of the difference is not the cause of the difference.

original: nag pa nyid la sogs pa la ni rgyu nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nag pa nyid la sogs pa la ni rgyu nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Blackness, etc., do not have the cause of the difference.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: yon tan zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: yon tan zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It says ‚Äúbecause of the qualities.‚Äù

original: nag ba nyid la sogs pa'i yon tan nyid ni /
analyzed: nag ba nyid la sogs pa'i yon tan nyid ni /
translated: The qualities of blackness and so forth are the qualities of the pot.üîΩ

original: gsal ba'i rang bzhin rdzas kyi rgyu ma yin no //
analyzed: gsal ba'i rang bzhin rdzas kyi rgyu ma yin no //
translated: The qualities of blueness, etc. are not the cause of the substance which is the nature of manifestation.

original: ci'i phyir rgyu ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir rgyu ma yin zhe na /
translated: Why are they not the cause?

original: de dang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de dang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Because they are simultaneous with it.

original: yon tan de dang rdzas grub bas bde ba gcig tu skye ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yon tan de dang rdzas grub bas bde ba gcig tu skye ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The qualities and the substance are simultaneously established and simultaneously manifest.

original: gang zhig gang dang lhan cig grub pa dang bde ba gcig pa de ni de'i rgyu ma yin no //
analyzed: gang zhig gang dang lhan cig grub pa dang bde ba gcig pa de ni de'i rgyu ma yin no //
translated: That which is simultaneously established and simultaneously manifest with something is not the cause of that.üîΩEven if blueness, etc. are the cause, there is still the fault.

original: yang na nag ba la sogs pa rgyu yin mod de lta na yang skyon nyid do zhes gsungs pa ni /üîΩrgyu nyid ces bya ba ste /üîΩgal te yon tan rdzas kyi rgyu yin @21b yang ;
analyzed: yang na nag ba la sogs pa rgyu yin mod de lta na yang skyon nyid do zhes gsungs pa ni / rgyu nyid ces bya ba ste / gal te yon tan rdzas kyi rgyu yin @21b yang ;
translated: The treatise states, ‚ÄúIf the qualities are the cause of the substance,üîΩthen the manifestation would be different from the qualities.‚Äù

original: de'i tshe yon tan de las gsal ba'i bdag nyid gzhan tha dad ba skyes pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i tshe yon tan de las gsal ba'i bdag nyid gzhan tha dad ba skyes pa yin no //
translated: If the qualities are the cause of the substance, then the manifestation, which is the nature of the qualities, would be produced as something different.

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu dag kyang dus tha dad pa'i phyir 'brel ba can ma yin te /
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu dag kyang dus tha dad pa'i phyir 'brel ba can ma yin te /
translated: Also, the cause and effect are not related because they are at different times.

original: rdzas la ltos nas yon tan 'bras bu'i dus su rjes su mi 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rdzas la ltos nas yon tan 'bras bu'i dus su rjes su mi 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The qualities, in dependence on the substance, do not continue into the time of the effect.

original: med pa ni 'brel ba can du 'gyur ba ma yin te /
analyzed: med pa ni 'brel ba can du 'gyur ba ma yin te /
translated: That which does not exist cannot be related.

original: des na dus tha dad ba can dag ni 'brel ba can du 'gyur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: des na dus tha dad ba can dag ni 'brel ba can du 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, those that exist at different times cannot be related.

original: dus tha mi dad na yang bum pa dang snam bu bzhin du 'brel ba can nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: dus tha mi dad na yang bum pa dang snam bu bzhin du 'brel ba can nyid ma yin no //
translated: Even if they existed at the same time, they would not be related, like a pot and a cloth.

original: dbyig pa dang skyes bu dag la ni de ltar rtog pas bkod pa ni yin gyi dngos po las ni ma yin no //
analyzed: dbyig pa dang skyes bu dag la ni de ltar rtog pas bkod pa ni yin gyi dngos po las ni ma yin no //
translated: The stick and the man are posited as related by conceptual thought, not by way of their intrinsic reality.

original: de'i phyir gal te yon tan gyis rdzas bskyed na de'i tshe yon tan 'brel pa can nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir gal te yon tan gyis rdzas bskyed na de'i tshe yon tan 'brel pa can nyid ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, if a substance is generated by a quality, then the quality is not related to it.

original: des na de la yang ste rgyur gyur pa'i yon tan dang ma 'brel ba'i rdzas la yang 'brel ba can gzhan yod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na de la yang ste rgyur gyur pa'i yon tan dang ma 'brel ba'i rdzas la yang 'brel ba can gzhan yod par 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, even in that case, a substance that is not related to a quality that is its cause would have another related cause.

original: de yang khyed kyi lugs kyi rgyu yin la /
analyzed: de yang khyed kyi lugs kyi rgyu yin la /
translated: And that would be a cause in your system.

original: rgyu yang 'bras bu'i dus na zhig pas 'brel ba can ma yin bas de'i 'brel pa grub pa'i don du rgyu gzhan tshol bas na thug pa med do //
analyzed: rgyu yang 'bras bu'i dus na zhig pas 'brel ba can ma yin bas de'i 'brel pa grub pa'i don du rgyu gzhan tshol bas na thug pa med do //
translated: But since a cause that has disintegrated at the time of the effect is not related to it, you would have to search for another cause to establish its relation. Thus, there would be an infinite regress.

original: tha dad pa'i yang phyir te /
analyzed: tha dad pa'i yang phyir te /
translated: Because they are different.

original: gang zhig gang las don gzhan yin ba de ni de'i 'brel ba can ma yin te /
analyzed: gang zhig gang las don gzhan yin ba de ni de'i 'brel ba can ma yin te /
translated: Whatever is a different object from something is not related to it,

original: dper na bum ba dang snam bu bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na bum ba dang snam bu bzhin no //
translated: like a pot and a cloth.

original: rgyu yang 'bras bu las don gzhan yin no //
analyzed: rgyu yang 'bras bu las don gzhan yin no //
translated: And a cause is a different object from an effect.

original: de bas na de dang 'brel ba can ma yin no //
analyzed: de bas na de dang 'brel ba can ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is not related to it.

original: rgyu 'brel pa can nyid yod na ha cang thal ba'i nyes pa brjod pa ni rgyu nyid ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rgyu 'brel pa can nyid yod na ha cang thal ba'i nyes pa brjod pa ni rgyu nyid ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The statement of the error of absurd overextension if there were a relation of cause and effect is ‚ÄúIf a cause were related to an effect. . . . ‚Äù

original: dogs ba ni de ltar zhes bya ba ni me ni du ba'i 'brel ba can ma yin no //
analyzed: dogs ba ni de ltar zhes bya ba ni me ni du ba'i 'brel ba can ma yin no //
translated: The doubt is ‚ÄúIf fire is not related to smoke. . . . ‚Äù

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: ma mthong ba'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ma mthong ba'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Because it is not seen.

original: 'o na ni zhes bya ba ni lan no //
analyzed: 'o na ni zhes bya ba ni lan no //
translated: The response is ‚ÄúWell then. . . . ‚Äù

original: 'brel ba can ni nag po nyid la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'brel ba can ni nag po nyid la sogs pa'o //
translated: The related is blackness, etc.

original: 'o na tha mi dad pa'i phyogs la yon tan can gyi tha dad par byed pa can yin no snyam na /
analyzed: 'o na tha mi dad pa'i phyogs la yon tan can gyi tha dad par byed pa can yin no snyam na /
translated: If you think that in the nondifferent position, the differentiator is the possessor of the qualities,üîΩthen the response is ‚ÄúWell then, the cause would not be related to the effect. . . . ‚Äù

original: bshad pa / yon tan dang rdzas dag tha dad pa min pa'i phyogs la gal te gsal ba tha dad pa yin na de'i tshi rnam ba'ang tha dad ba der ci ste mi 'dod /
analyzed: bshad pa / yon tan dang rdzas dag tha dad pa min pa'i phyogs la gal te gsal ba tha dad pa yin na de'i tshi rnam ba'ang tha dad ba der ci ste mi 'dod /
translated: NƒÅgƒÅrjuna responds: If, in the context of the position that qualities and substances are not different, manifestations are different, then why don‚Äôt you assert that their aspects are also different?

original: gal te nag po la sogs ba'i tha dad la /
analyzed: gal te nag po la sogs ba'i tha dad la /
translated: If you say that the differences of black and so on

original: rnam pa dang ldan pa tha mi dad la /üîΩnyes kyang de tha dad par byed pa yin na /
analyzed: rnam pa dang ldan pa tha mi dad la / nyes kyang de tha dad par byed pa yin na /
translated: are not different from the possessor of aspects,üîΩand that the differences of the aspects are made by the differences of the possessor of aspects,

original: de'i tshe rnam pa dang ldan pa tha dad ba las dbyer med pa ni rnam pa yang tha dad pa nyid do //
analyzed: de'i tshe rnam pa dang ldan pa tha dad ba las dbyer med pa ni rnam pa yang tha dad pa nyid do //
translated: then at that time, the aspects that are inseparable from the different possessor of aspects are also different.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: tha dad las dbyer med tha dad ces gsungs so //üîΩyon tan gyi khyad bar can gyi rdzas @22a * //
analyzed: tha dad las dbyer med tha dad ces gsungs so // yon tan gyi khyad bar can gyi rdzas @22a * //
translated: It is stated: ‚ÄúInseparable from the different, it is different.‚Äù

original: tha dad pa las dbyer med pa'i rnam pa gang yin pa de ni tha dad pa nyid de /
analyzed: tha dad pa las dbyer med pa'i rnam pa gang yin pa de ni tha dad pa nyid de /
translated: The aspect that is inseparable from the different substance that has the distinction of the qualitiesüîΩis different.

original: nag po la sogs pa tha dad pa las tha mi dad ba'i rnam pa dang ldan pa gang yin ba de ni tha mi dad pa kho na'o //
analyzed: nag po la sogs pa tha dad pa las tha mi dad ba'i rnam pa dang ldan pa gang yin ba de ni tha mi dad pa kho na'o //
translated: The possessor of aspects that is inseparable from the different black and so on is only different.

original: de las tha mi dad pa'i rnam pa yang tha dad pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de las tha mi dad pa'i rnam pa yang tha dad pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the aspects are not different from that.

original: gzhan du zhes bya ba ni tha dad pa'i rdzas las gal te tha mi dad pa'i rang bzhin gyi rnam pa tha dad pa ma yin na /
analyzed: gzhan du zhes bya ba ni tha dad pa'i rdzas las gal te tha mi dad pa'i rang bzhin gyi rnam pa tha dad pa ma yin na /

original: de'i tshe gsal ba dang rnam ba dag tha mi dad par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i tshe gsal ba dang rnam ba dag tha mi dad par mi 'gyur te /
translated: then the manifestation and the aspects would not be different,

original: grub pa dang bde ba tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: grub pa dang bde ba tha dad pa'i phyir ro //

original: re zhig rtsod pa'i cha nyid rnam par 'grel ba ni nag po zhes bya'o //
analyzed: re zhig rtsod pa'i cha nyid rnam par 'grel ba ni nag po zhes bya'o //
translated: The part of the debate itself is explained as ‚Äúblack.‚Äù

original: tha dad pa las zhes bya ba ni nag po la sogs pa las tha mi dad pa ni gsal ba'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: tha dad pa las zhes bya ba ni nag po la sogs pa las tha mi dad pa ni gsal ba'i rang bzhin no //
translated: From the different, that is, from the different substance, the manifestation is not different, because the nature of the manifestation is not different.

original: des gsal ba rnams tha mi dad pa yin no zhes sems pa'o //üîΩgrub pa'i mtha'i cha rnam par 'grel ba ni /
analyzed: des gsal ba rnams tha mi dad pa yin no zhes sems pa'o // grub pa'i mtha'i cha rnam par 'grel ba ni /
translated: By that, the manifestations are not different.

original: 'o na ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'o na ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The part of the philosophical position is explained as ‚ÄúWell, then.‚Äù

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: rnam pa yang zhes smos so //
analyzed: rnam pa yang zhes smos so //
translated: The aspects are also mentioned.

original: rnam pa tha dad pa nyid nye bar sdud pa ni /
analyzed: rnam pa tha dad pa nyid nye bar sdud pa ni /
translated: The summary of the difference in the aspects is

original: des na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: des na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúTherefore‚Äù means:

original: gang la ltos te snang bzhin pa mdun na 'dug pa'i rnam pa tha dad par 'gyur snyam na rnam pa dang ldan pa gzhan dang / yul gzhan na gnas pa'i rnam pa las kyang ngo //
analyzed: gang la ltos te snang bzhin pa mdun na 'dug pa'i rnam pa tha dad par 'gyur snyam na rnam pa dang ldan pa gzhan dang / yul gzhan na gnas pa'i rnam pa las kyang ngo //
translated: If one thinks that the aspect that appears in dependence on something else, and is present in front, would be different, [the answer is:] not from the possessor of the aspect, nor from the aspect that is present in another object.

original: rnam pa ni zhes bya ba nas zhe na'i bar du ni rtsod pa'o //
analyzed: rnam pa ni zhes bya ba nas zhe na'i bar du ni rtsod pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThe aspect‚Äù up to ‚Äúis not different‚Äù is the dispute.

original: yon tan du gyur pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: yon tan du gyur pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: ‚ÄúThe quality‚Äù is:

original: rnam pa ni ldan pa yin la /
analyzed: rnam pa ni ldan pa yin la /
translated: The aspect is the possessor of the quality.

original: de yang yon tan yin no //
analyzed: de yang yon tan yin no //
translated: And that is a quality.

original: yon tan rnams yon tan can las tha dad pa yin na 'di brjod par rigs te /
analyzed: yon tan rnams yon tan can las tha dad pa yin na 'di brjod par rigs te /
translated: If the qualities are different from the possessor of the qualities, this is reasonable to say:

original: yon tan can la ni yon tan rnams 'du ba yin gyis yon tan rnams ni phan tshun 'du ba ma yin no zhes bya bar ro //
analyzed: yon tan can la ni yon tan rnams 'du ba yin gyis yon tan rnams ni phan tshun 'du ba ma yin no zhes bya bar ro //
translated: The qualities are assembled in the possessor of the qualities, but the qualities are not mutually assembled.

original: yon tan dang yon tan can gcig par gyur na ni ;
analyzed: yon tan dang yon tan can gcig par gyur na ni ;
translated: If the qualities and the possessor of the qualities are the same,

original: 'di brjod par mi rigs so zhes 'brel to //
analyzed: 'di brjod par mi rigs so zhes 'brel to //
translated: this is not reasonable to say.

original: gang zhig mi rigs snyam na /
analyzed: gang zhig mi rigs snyam na /
translated: If one thinks what is not reasonable,

original: yon tan la sogs pa 'di ni yon tan can 'dir yin gyis /
analyzed: yon tan la sogs pa 'di ni yon tan can 'dir yin gyis /
translated: this quality and so forth is in this possessor of the quality,

original: yon tan can 'di la ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: yon tan can 'di la ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'o //
translated: but not in this one which has qualities.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: dbyer med phyir te gsal ba dang yon tan dang tha dad pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dbyer med phyir te gsal ba dang yon tan dang tha dad pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of non-difference, because the manifestation is not different from the qualities.

original: des na nag po nyid la sogs pa sna tshogs pa dang tha mi dad pa'i phyir gsal ba rnams sna tshogs pa yin pa de bzhin du gsal ba dang tha mi dad pa'i rnam ba yang yin no //
analyzed: des na nag po nyid la sogs pa sna tshogs pa dang tha mi dad pa'i phyir gsal ba rnams sna tshogs pa yin pa de bzhin du gsal ba dang tha mi dad pa'i rnam ba yang yin no //
translated: Therefore, because of non-difference from the various things such as blackness, the manifestations are various, and in the same way, the manifestation is not different from the various qualities.

original: des na nyas pa snga ma las mi 'grel lo //
analyzed: des na nyas pa snga ma las mi 'grel lo //
translated: Thus, the previous fault is not removed.

original: gal te nag po la sogs pa dang gsal bdag tha mi dad na nyes pa yod na /
analyzed: gal te nag po la sogs pa dang gsal bdag tha mi dad na nyes pa yod na /
translated: If there is a fault in the non-difference of the manifestation from blackness, etc.,

original: 'o na tha @22b dad par 'gyur mod /
analyzed: 'o na tha @22b dad par 'gyur mod /
translated: then they are different, of course.

original: gzhan gyis brjod pa'i lan ni /
analyzed: gzhan gyis brjod pa'i lan ni /
translated: The reply of the opponent is:

original: 'di ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is the case.

original: rtsed mo nyid kyi gzhung 'dzugs pa ni tha dad phyogs ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rtsed mo nyid kyi gzhung 'dzugs pa ni tha dad phyogs ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The establishment of the thesis of non-difference is: The position of difference.

original: phyogs gzhan zhes bya ba ni tha mi dad pa'i phyogs so //
analyzed: phyogs gzhan zhes bya ba ni tha mi dad pa'i phyogs so //
translated: The other position is the position of non-difference.

original: der yang ni tha mi dad pa'i phyogs la yang ngo //
analyzed: der yang ni tha mi dad pa'i phyogs la yang ngo //
translated: There also means in the position of non-difference.

original: snga ma zhes bya ba tha dad pa'i phyogs la brten pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: snga ma zhes bya ba tha dad pa'i phyogs la brten pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The former is based on the position of difference.

original: 'dis ni zhes bya ba ni rnam pa spyi yin pa spangs pas so //
analyzed: 'dis ni zhes bya ba ni rnam pa spyi yin pa spangs pas so //
translated: This is because it is the general aspect that is abandoned.

original: de nyid brjod pa ni de yang zhes bya ba ste gtso po yang ste /
analyzed: de nyid brjod pa ni de yang zhes bya ba ste gtso po yang ste /
translated: That itself is stated by ‚Äúthat‚Äù and ‚Äúthe principal.‚Äù

original: gtso bo de'i gnas skabs thams cad 'dzin pa'i phyir skyes bu thams cad kyis thams cad mthong bar thal lo //
analyzed: gtso bo de'i gnas skabs thams cad 'dzin pa'i phyir skyes bu thams cad kyis thams cad mthong bar thal lo //
translated: Because it holds all the states of the principal, it follows that all persons would see all.üîΩWhy is that?

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /üîΩde kho na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na / de kho na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Because it is that itself.

analyzed: thams cad thams cad kyi bdag nyid yin pa ni rtogs pas gnod do zhes lan 'debs pa ni de yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The response that refutes the consequence that all would see all is ‚ÄúIf that is so.‚Äù

original: gtso bo'i mtshan nyid kyi spyi khas len na /üîΩgrangs can rang gi lugs dang 'gal ba yang yin no zhes bstan pa'i don du de'i lugs 'god pa ni /
analyzed: gtso bo'i mtshan nyid kyi spyi khas len na /üîΩgrangs can rang gi lugs dang 'gal ba yang yin no zhes bstan pa'i don du de'i lugs 'god pa ni /
translated: The response

original: thams cad ces bya ba nas mthong ba yin zhes bya ba'i bar ro //
analyzed: thams cad ces bya ba nas mthong ba yin zhes bya ba'i bar ro //
translated: ‚ÄúEverything‚Äù up to ‚Äúis seen.‚Äù

original: 'bras bu thams cad gtso bo'i bdag nyid can gyi rgyu la nus pa'i rang bzhin te mngon par mi gsal ba'i rang bzhin du gnas pa gang yin pa de ni gtso bo yin te /
analyzed: 'bras bu thams cad gtso bo'i bdag nyid can gyi rgyu la nus pa'i rang bzhin te mngon par mi gsal ba'i rang bzhin du gnas pa gang yin pa de ni gtso bo yin te /
translated: The nature of the cause that is the nature of the primary cause of all effects is the nature of the potential that exists in a nonmanifest form. That is the primary cause.

original: don dam par yod pa ni yin no //
analyzed: don dam par yod pa ni yin no //
translated: It exists ultimately.

original: ci ltar de dag der gnas she na /
analyzed: ci ltar de dag der gnas she na /
translated: How do they exist in that?

original: 'gro ba kun de las shes par bya ba ste /
analyzed: 'gro ba kun de las shes par bya ba ste /
translated: The entire world is known from that.

original: gang gi phyir 'gro ba mtha' dag ni gtso bo de las skye bar 'gyur ba yin te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'gro ba mtha' dag ni gtso bo de las skye bar 'gyur ba yin te /
translated: Because the entire world arises from that primary cause.

original: gseg ma la sogs pa las til mar la sogs pa med pa ni skye ba mi srid de /
analyzed: gseg ma la sogs pa las til mar la sogs pa med pa ni skye ba mi srid de /
translated: Oil, etc., do not arise from sand, etc.

original: des na gang zhig gang gis skyed byed yin pa de la de gnas pa yin no zhes rtogs pa yin no //üîΩ'on gtso bo las spyi gzhan yin no snyam na /
analyzed: des na gang zhig gang gis skyed byed yin pa de la de gnas pa yin no zhes rtogs pa yin no // 'on gtso bo las spyi gzhan yin no snyam na /
translated: Therefore, it is understood that that which produces something is its primary cause.

original: gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: But if you think that the universal is different from the primary cause,üîΩthen the root text states, ‚ÄúIf the universal . . .‚Äù

original: de nyid ces bya ba ni gtso bo nyid spyi yin no //
analyzed: de nyid ces bya ba ni gtso bo nyid spyi yin no //
translated: ‚ÄúThat itself‚Äù means the primary cause itself is the universal.

original: gal te spyi'i mtshan nyid med pa'i phyir ci ltar de spyi yin zhe na /
analyzed: gal te spyi'i mtshan nyid med pa'i phyir ci ltar de spyi yin zhe na /
translated: If you ask, ‚ÄúHow can it be a universal if it does not have a universal characteristic?‚Äù

original: khyab pa dang ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: khyab pa dang ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: [The root text] states, ‚ÄúBecause it pervades.‚Äù

original: 'o na 'di gsal ba'i rang bzhin ma yin bas na gtan mi mthong ba kho na'o snyam na /
analyzed: 'o na 'di gsal ba'i rang bzhin ma yin bas na gtan mi mthong ba kho na'o snyam na /
translated: If you think, ‚ÄúBut it is not the nature of a manifestation, so it is never seen at all,‚Äù

original: mthong bzhin pa ni zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: mthong bzhin pa ni zhes bya ba ste /
translated: [the root text] states, ‚ÄúIt is seen.‚Äù

original: bum pa dang snam bu la sogs pa mthong ba rnams phan tshun tha dad pa'i phyir gsal ba ste /üîΩkhyad par gang yin pa de nyid thar ba'i gnas skabs na gtso bo gsal ba ste mngon @23a * //
analyzed: bum pa dang snam bu la sogs pa mthong ba rnams phan tshun tha dad pa'i phyir gsal ba ste / khyad par gang yin pa de nyid thar ba'i gnas skabs na gtso bo gsal ba ste mngon @23a * //
translated: Because things such as pots and cloth that are seen are mutually distinct, they are manifestations.

original: par gsal ba yin no //
analyzed: par gsal ba yin no //
translated: That which is a particular is the manifestation, or the clear manifestation, of the primal matter in the state of liberation.

original: des na de gtan mi mthong ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: des na de gtan mi mthong ba ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is not the case that it is never seen.

original: gal te de ltar mngon bar 'dod na /
analyzed: gal te de ltar mngon bar 'dod na /
translated: If you assert that it is manifested in this way,

original: 'dir 'di ni 'gal pa yin te'o //
analyzed: 'dir 'di ni 'gal pa yin te'o //
translated: then this is contradictory.

original: gang zhig 'gal snyam na /
analyzed: gang zhig 'gal snyam na /
translated: If you ask, ‚ÄúWhat is contradictory?‚Äù

original: yon tan zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: yon tan zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: [The root text] states, ‚ÄúThe qualities, etc.‚Äù

original: yon tan snying stobs dang rdul dang mun pa rnams kyi rang bzhin mchog ces bya ba spyi'i gnas skabs su gyur pa'i mtshan nyid ni mthong ba'i lam du 'gro ba ma yin te /
analyzed: yon tan snying stobs dang rdul dang mun pa rnams kyi rang bzhin mchog ces bya ba spyi'i gnas skabs su gyur pa'i mtshan nyid ni mthong ba'i lam du 'gro ba ma yin te /
translated: The nature of the qualities sattva, rajas, and tamas is called ‚Äúsupreme‚Äù and is the general state. It is not a characteristic that goes on the path of seeing,

original: rnal 'byor bas rtogs par bya pa yin ba'i phyir dang / thams cad kyang de nyid du bag la zha bar gnas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnal 'byor bas rtogs par bya pa yin ba'i phyir dang / thams cad kyang de nyid du bag la zha bar gnas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is to be realized by the yogi, and because everything is contained in it.

original: yang skyed mos mtshal dang kun dga' rab la sogs pa'i mthong ba'i lam du gang gyur pa de ni gtso bo yang shin tu gsog pa ngo bo nyid med pa yin no zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: yang skyed mos mtshal dang kun dga' rab la sogs pa'i mthong ba'i lam du gang gyur pa de ni gtso bo yang shin tu gsog pa ngo bo nyid med pa yin no zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Moreover, that which is on the path of seeing, such as a garden, a pleasure grove, and so on, is also the supreme, which is totally unreal.

original: 'di ci ltar 'gal snyam na /
analyzed: 'di ci ltar 'gal snyam na /
translated: How is this contradictory?

original: gang gis phyir zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gang gis phyir zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Because of what?

original: 'bras bu gzhan du mi 'thad pa'i sgo nas 'bras bu gang zhig nus pa'i rang bzhin gyis gtso bo la brtags ba ste srog nyid kyis gtso bor de yang ni gsog nyid 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'bras bu gzhan du mi 'thad pa'i sgo nas 'bras bu gang zhig nus pa'i rang bzhin gyis gtso bo la brtags ba ste srog nyid kyis gtso bor de yang ni gsog nyid 'gyur ro //
translated: The result is imagined to be in the nature of the potential of the primal substance, and that also is unreal, because the result is not tenable as something else.

original: yang ci ltar na 'bras bu gsog tu gyur bas de yang gsog nyid yin snyam na /
analyzed: yang ci ltar na 'bras bu gsog tu gyur bas de yang gsog nyid yin snyam na /
translated: Again, one might think, ‚ÄúSince the effect is accumulated, it is also an accumulation.‚Äù

original: rgyu la zhes gsungs te gtso bo zhes grags pa la'o //
analyzed: rgyu la zhes gsungs te gtso bo zhes grags pa la'o //
translated: The root text states, ‚ÄúIn the cause,‚Äù that is, in what is renowned as the primal matter.

original: de'i rang bzhin te nus pa'i rang bzhin nyid yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin te nus pa'i rang bzhin nyid yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The nature of that, that is, the nature of its potential, exists.

original: gtso bo na ni 'bras bu nus pa'i rang bzhin du yod pa yin la /üîΩnus pa yang gsal pa nyid dam /
analyzed: gtso bo na ni 'bras bu nus pa'i rang bzhin du yod pa yin la / nus pa yang gsal pa nyid dam /
translated: The effect exists in the primal matter in the nature of potential.

original: yang na dngos po gzhan yin par 'gyur ro /
analyzed: yang na dngos po gzhan yin par 'gyur ro /
translated: And the potential is either manifestation itself or another thing.

original: gal te gsal ba nyid nus pa yin na ni de'i tshe gtso bo dang nus pa de'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir na /
analyzed: gal te gsal ba nyid nus pa yin na ni de'i tshe gtso bo dang nus pa de'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir na /
translated: If manifestation itself is the potential, then at that time, since the primal matter and the potential are identical,

original: 'bras bu'i rang bzhin gyis gsal ba rnams gsog yin na gtso bo yang gsog nyid do //
analyzed: 'bras bu'i rang bzhin gyis gsal ba rnams gsog yin na gtso bo yang gsog nyid do //
translated: if the manifestations, which are the nature of the effect, are an accumulation, then the primal matter is also an accumulation.

original: des na gtso bo yod pa yin no zhes khas blangs pa 'gal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na gtso bo yod pa yin no zhes khas blangs pa 'gal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, it would contradict your assertion that the primal matter exists.

original: de'i phyir gsal pa 'bras bu'i tshogs rnams gsog nyid yin na /
analyzed: de'i phyir gsal pa 'bras bu'i tshogs rnams gsog nyid yin na /
translated: Therefore, if the collection of the effects, the manifestations, are an accumulation,

original: de'i sgo nas brtag par bya ba nus pa'i rang bzhin gyi 'bras bu gang yin pa de yang gsog nyid du 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i sgo nas brtag par bya ba nus pa'i rang bzhin gyi 'bras bu gang yin pa de yang gsog nyid du 'gyur te /
translated: And the effect that is a potential nature that is able to be analyzed in that way would also be a collection.

original: de las tha mi dad ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de las tha mi dad ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not different from that.

original: de gsog yin pa na de dang tha mi dad pa'i phyir gtso bo gang gsog tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de gsog yin pa na de dang tha mi dad pa'i phyir gtso bo gang gsog tu 'gyur ro //
translated: If that is a collection, then because it is not different from that, the primal substance would be a collection.

original: gal te gsal ba'i mtshan nyid 'bras bu nyid nus pa yin na de'i tshe 'di ltar 'gyur ba zhig na /
analyzed: gal te gsal ba'i mtshan nyid 'bras bu nyid nus pa yin na de'i tshe 'di ltar 'gyur ba zhig na /
translated: If the effect that has the characteristic of manifestation were potential nature, then it would be like this.

original: 'on kyang gsog gi rang bzhin du gyur ba'i gsal ba las gsog ma yin pa'i rang bzhin gyis nus pa ni gzhan kho na yin pas gtso bo de dang bdag nyid gcig pa yin yang @23b gsog ma yin pa nyid do zhes bya ba'i phyogs gnyis pa'i dogs
analyzed: 'on kyang gsog gi rang bzhin du gyur ba'i gsal ba las gsog ma yin pa'i rang bzhin gyis nus pa ni gzhan kho na yin pas gtso bo de dang bdag nyid gcig pa yin yang @23b gsog ma yin pa nyid do zhes bya ba'i phyogs gnyis pa'i dogs
translated: But the potential nature that is different from the manifestation that has the nature of a collection is a different thing, so even though it is the same nature as that primal substance, it is not a collection.

original: ba bsu ba ni /
analyzed: ba bsu ba ni /
translated: The second position is anticipated:

original: ci ste zhes bya ba ni rgyu la yod pa'i 'bras bu nus pa'i rang bzhin can ni gsal ba las gzhan nyid yin gyi gsog gi rang bzhin ni ma yin no //
analyzed: ci ste zhes bya ba ni rgyu la yod pa'i 'bras bu nus pa'i rang bzhin can ni gsal ba las gzhan nyid yin gyi gsog gi rang bzhin ni ma yin no //
translated: If the effect that exists in the cause has the nature of potential, then it is different from manifestation, but it does not have the nature of a collection.

original: 'dis ni de'i rang bzhin ni yod phyir zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs ma grub par brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dis ni de'i rang bzhin ni yod phyir zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs ma grub par brjod pa yin no //
translated: This is saying that the reason, ‚Äúbecause its nature exists,‚Äù is unestablished.

original: lan 'debs pa ni de zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: lan 'debs pa ni de zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The response is ‚Äúthat . . .‚Äù

original: gal te rgyu'i bdag nyid la yod pa'i nus pa'i rang bzhin gsog ma yin na de'i tshe de las 'bras bu gsog tu gyur pa skye ba ni snga na med pa nyid bas 'bras bu sngar yod par smra ba nyams par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te rgyu'i bdag nyid la yod pa'i nus pa'i rang bzhin gsog ma yin na de'i tshe de las 'bras bu gsog tu gyur pa skye ba ni snga na med pa nyid bas 'bras bu sngar yod par smra ba nyams par 'gyur ro //
translated: If the nature of the cause that exists as potential is not a non-producer, then at that time, the effect that is produced from it would be a non-prior, and the assertion that the effect exists prior would be undermined.

original: gal te rgyu la 'bras bu mi gsal ba ni rang bzhin du yod pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te rgyu la 'bras bu mi gsal ba ni rang bzhin du yod pa ma yin nam /
translated: If the effect that is not manifest in the cause does not exist by nature,

original: des na 'bras bu snga na yod par smra ba mi nyams so snyam na /
analyzed: des na 'bras bu snga na yod par smra ba mi nyams so snyam na /
translated: then the assertion that the effect exists prior would not be undermined.

original: gang zhig ces smos so //üîΩnus pa'i rang bzhin gang zhig lkog tu gyur pa mngon sum gyis mthong ba ma yin pas /
analyzed: gang zhig ces smos so // nus pa'i rang bzhin gang zhig lkog tu gyur pa mngon sum gyis mthong ba ma yin pas /
translated: ‚Äú That which . . .‚Äù is stated.üîΩThat potential nature that is hidden and not seen by direct perception,

original: rtags med bas rjes su dpag pas kyang ma yin pa de nyid don dam pa ma yin pa yod pa'i tha snyad du mi rung ba yin no //
analyzed: rtags med bas rjes su dpag pas kyang ma yin pa de nyid don dam pa ma yin pa yod pa'i tha snyad du mi rung ba yin no //
translated: since there is no reason, it is also not seen by inference. That very thing is not suitable as an existent that is conventionally designated as ultimate.

original: de la ni gnod par byed pa yang brjod zin ba nyid de /
analyzed: de la ni gnod par byed pa yang brjod zin ba nyid de /
translated: The refutation of this has already been stated.

original: des na de ni rnam 'byed bas rtogs par bya ba yin no zhes kyang brtag bar bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: des na de ni rnam 'byed bas rtogs par bya ba yin no zhes kyang brtag bar bya ba ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is not to be examined whether it is to be understood by way of differentiation.

original: de'i phyir gzhan gyis yon tan rnams kyi rang bzhin mchog ces bya ba la sogs pa brjod pa gang yin pa de ni 'gal ba yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir gzhan gyis yon tan rnams kyi rang bzhin mchog ces bya ba la sogs pa brjod pa gang yin pa de ni 'gal ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, the statement by others that the nature of the qualities is supreme, etc., is contradictory.

original: dus mtshungs pa yul tha dad pa'i gsal ba gang yin pa de khyab pa'i spyi ni 'dzin pa nyid do //
analyzed: dus mtshungs pa yul tha dad pa'i gsal ba gang yin pa de khyab pa'i spyi ni 'dzin pa nyid do //
translated: The universal that pervades the manifestation that is simultaneous and of different objects is apprehended.

original: gal te gsal ba ma bzung yang spyi dgos pa med pa ci'i phyir snyam na /
analyzed: gal te gsal ba ma bzung yang spyi dgos pa med pa ci'i phyir snyam na /
translated: If the manifestation is not apprehended, why is the universal, which is purposeless, apprehended?

original: de 'dra'i zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de 'dra'i zhes bya'o //
translated: It is said, ‚Äúsuch a universal. . . .‚Äù

original: gang gi phyir gzhan gyi lugs la /üîΩbrda'i dus su gsal ba tha dad pa la spyir khyab par ma bzung na dus phyis de ltar tha snyad byed pa mi 'thad do //
analyzed: gang gi phyir gzhan gyi lugs la / brda'i dus su gsal ba tha dad pa la spyir khyab par ma bzung na dus phyis de ltar tha snyad byed pa mi 'thad do //
translated: Because in the system of others,üîΩif the universal that pervades the different manifestations is not apprehended at the time of the convention, later it is not tenable to make such a convention.

original: spyi ni tha snyad kyi don du 'dod pa yin na de ltar ni khyab pa bzung ba ma yin no //
analyzed: spyi ni tha snyad kyi don du 'dod pa yin na de ltar ni khyab pa bzung ba ma yin no //
translated: If the universal is asserted to be the referent of the convention, then the pervasion is not apprehended in that way.

original: des na spyi ni dgos pa med pa kho na'o //
analyzed: des na spyi ni dgos pa med pa kho na'o //
translated: Therefore, the universal is absolutely useless.

original: ra dkar po gang zhig sngar lha la gsol ba mthong ba yod pa de'i rigs zhes bya ba ni ra'i rigs rjes su 'gro ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ra dkar po gang zhig sngar lha la gsol ba mthong ba yod pa de'i rigs zhes bya ba ni ra'i rigs rjes su 'gro ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The universal of the white cow is the universal of the cow because it is the universal that is common to all cows.

original: tha snyad pa dag gis zhes bya ba ni de nyid 'di'o zhes tha snyad byed pa dag gis so //
analyzed: tha snyad pa dag gis zhes bya ba ni de nyid 'di'o zhes tha snyad byed pa dag gis so //
translated: The expression ‚Äúby those who use expressions‚Äù means by those who use expressions such as ‚Äúthis is the same as that.‚Äù

original: ci'i phyir ji ltar 'dod snyam na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir ji ltar 'dod snyam na /
translated: Why?

original: dus gcig tu zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dus gcig tu zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúAt the same time.‚Äù

original: de ni zhes bya ba ni spyi'i tha snyad la'o //
analyzed: de ni zhes bya ba ni spyi'i tha snyad la'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThat‚Äù refers to the expression of the universal.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: gnyi ga yang zhes bya ba'o //üîΩ'o na sngar gyi rjes su @24a * //
analyzed: gnyi ga yang zhes bya ba'o // 'o na sngar gyi rjes su @24a * //
translated: ‚ÄúBecause both are seen.‚Äù

original: 'brangs nas rtogs pa gang dag yin pa de la spyi yod mod snyam na /
analyzed: 'brangs nas rtogs pa gang dag yin pa de la spyi yod mod snyam na /
translated: If the universal exists, then why is it that one first sees the individual cow and then, following that, understands the universal?

original: snga ma dang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: snga ma dang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThe former‚Äù refers to the individual cow.

original: tha dad pa'i zhes bya ba ni mdog dang rnam pa dang yi ges stong pa'o //
analyzed: tha dad pa'i zhes bya ba ni mdog dang rnam pa dang yi ges stong pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúDifferent‚Äù means that it is devoid of color, shape, and letters.

original: de bzhin du dus mtshungs ba dag la yang spyi mthong ba med do zhes brjod pa ni /
analyzed: de bzhin du dus mtshungs ba dag la yang spyi mthong ba med do zhes brjod pa ni /
translated: Similarly, one does not see the universal in things that exist at the same time.

original: de bzhin du dus mtshungs ba dag la yang gsal ba dang mi gsal ba'i rnam pa las gzhan pa'i spyi yod pa ma yin no zhes 'brel to //
analyzed: de bzhin du dus mtshungs ba dag la yang gsal ba dang mi gsal ba'i rnam pa las gzhan pa'i spyi yod pa ma yin no zhes 'brel to //
translated: In the same way, there is no universal that is other than the manifest and unmanifest forms of things that exist at the same time.

original: gal te dus mtshungs bar byung bdag la spyi med pa nyid na /üîΩ'o na ci ltar zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi'o //
analyzed: gal te dus mtshungs bar byung bdag la spyi med pa nyid na / 'o na ci ltar zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi'o //
translated: If there is no universal that exists at the same time as the things that are its instances,üîΩthen how is it that the opponent says,üîΩ‚ÄúThis cognition‚Äù?

original: lan ni rtogs pa 'di ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: lan ni rtogs pa 'di ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The response is, ‚ÄúThis cognition is not of a universal that exists apart from the things that are its instances.‚Äù

original: de la zhes bya ba ni snga phyir byung ba dag la'o //
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba ni snga phyir byung ba dag la'o //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúin the case of things that exist at different times‚Äù refers to the things that exist before and after.

original: gsal ba dus mtshungs pa dag la yang 'brel pa can gyi spyi mngon sum gyi mthong ba med do //
analyzed: gsal ba dus mtshungs pa dag la yang 'brel pa can gyi spyi mngon sum gyi mthong ba med do //
translated: There is no perception of a universal that is related to the manifest things that exist at the same time.

original: de nyid kyi phyir spyi zhes bya ba ni zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir spyi zhes bya ba ni zhes gsungs so //
translated: For that very reason, the root text states, ‚ÄúThe so-called universal is not a real entity.‚Äù

original: tshig gi lhag ma med na ni ma 'brel ba brjod par 'gyur te /
analyzed: tshig gi lhag ma med na ni ma 'brel ba brjod par 'gyur te /
translated: If the word ‚Äúonly‚Äù is not supplied, then the statement would be open to the interpretation that the universal is not a real entity, but that it is related to the things that are its instances.

original: bsal ba rnams ni myong bas grub ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsal ba rnams ni myong bas grub ba'i phyir ro //
translated: However, since the individual things are established by experience,üîΩthe word ‚Äúonly‚Äù is supplied in order to indicate that the universal does not exist apart from the things that are its instances.

original: snga ma dang zhes bya ba ni rnam par 'grel ba'o //
analyzed: snga ma dang zhes bya ba ni rnam par 'grel ba'o //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúin the case of things that exist at different times‚Äù is an explanation.

original: 'ba' zhig ces bya ba ni dmigs pa med pa'o //
analyzed: 'ba' zhig ces bya ba ni dmigs pa med pa'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúonly‚Äù indicates that the universal does not exist apart from the things that are its instances.

original: rtogs par bya ba'i spyi'i bdag nyid kyi dmigs pa ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtogs par bya ba'i spyi'i bdag nyid kyi dmigs pa ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because the object of the general nature of the object of knowledge is not seen.

original: rtogs par bya ba'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rtogs par bya ba'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The so-called object of knowledge is

original: kha dog dang dbyibs su snang ba la lang gi rnam par rtog ba'o //
analyzed: kha dog dang dbyibs su snang ba la lang gi rnam par rtog ba'o //
translated: the conceptualization of a cow in the appearance of color and shape.

original: des de ni kha dog la sogs pa dang bral ba'i spyi 'ga' yang rtogs pa med do //
analyzed: des de ni kha dog la sogs pa dang bral ba'i spyi 'ga' yang rtogs pa med do //
translated: By that, there is no knowledge of any generality devoid of color, etc.

original: de'i gzung ba zhes bya ba ni rtogs pa de la mdog la sogs pa dang bral ba'i gzung ba spyi snang ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i gzung ba zhes bya ba ni rtogs pa de la mdog la sogs pa dang bral ba'i gzung ba spyi snang ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The so-called apprehended object is because the appearance of the apprehended generality devoid of color, etc. in that knowledge does not exist.

original: snga ma dang phyi ma'i khyad par gang yin pa de bzhin no //
analyzed: snga ma dang phyi ma'i khyad par gang yin pa de bzhin no //
translated: The difference between the former and latter is just like that.

original: 'dis ni rang bzhin gyi rtags bstan to //
analyzed: 'dis ni rang bzhin gyi rtags bstan to //
translated: This shows the logical mark of nature.

original: gang zhig ces bya ba la sogs pa ni rnam par 'grel ba'o //
analyzed: gang zhig ces bya ba la sogs pa ni rnam par 'grel ba'o //
translated: The so-called and so on is the commentary.

original: de la zhes bya ba la ni rtogs pa la'o //
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba la ni rtogs pa la'o //
translated: There, in the so-called is in the knowledge.

original: rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs so zhes bya ba ni dmigs pa med pa nyid bsgrub par bya ba la phyi rol mi snang ba nyid rang bzhin yin no //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs so zhes bya ba ni dmigs pa med pa nyid bsgrub par bya ba la phyi rol mi snang ba nyid rang bzhin yin no //
translated: The reason is intrinsic nature. The non-appearance of external objects is the intrinsic nature of the non-existence of objects.

original: thams cad ces bya ba ni ngang pa dang khra po la sogs pa la'o //
analyzed: thams cad ces bya ba ni ngang pa dang khra po la sogs pa la'o //
translated: All refers to geese, hawks, etc.

original: ci ltar yul nges bar skye zhes khong nas dbyung ngo //
analyzed: ci ltar yul nges bar skye zhes khong nas dbyung ngo //
translated: How is it that the object is ascertained? he asks.

original: de nyid kyi phyir 'ga' zhig nyid la zhes 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir 'ga' zhig nyid la zhes 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: For that very reason, he will explain in some cases.

original: ldog ba'i rang bzhin ci 'dra ba yin snyam na de yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ldog ba'i rang bzhin ci 'dra ba yin snyam na de yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: What is the intrinsic nature of the exclusion? He says, That too.

original: de tsam gyis ni sgro btags pa'i rnam pa tsam gyis so //
analyzed: de tsam gyis ni sgro btags pa'i rnam pa tsam gyis so //
translated: By that alone, by the mere superimposed form.

original: 'dir ni rigs la'o //
analyzed: 'dir ni rigs la'o //
translated: Here, it is in the class.

original: chos dang chos @24b min te dge ba dang sdig pa grub pa'i don du'o //üîΩbram ze'i rigs la byin na ni chos yin la /
analyzed: chos dang chos @24b min te dge ba dang sdig pa grub pa'i don du'o // bram ze'i rigs la byin na ni chos yin la /
translated: Dharma and adharma, virtue and vice, for the sake of accomplishing the goal.

original: bsad na ni sdig pa yin no //
analyzed: bsad na ni sdig pa yin no //
translated: Giving to the Brahmin class is dharma, but killing is adharma.

original: de'i bya ba ni rigs kyi'o //
analyzed: de'i bya ba ni rigs kyi'o //
translated: The action of that is the class's.

original: grub kyang zhes bya ba ni ma grub pa 'ga' zhig tu ni ma zad pa'o //
analyzed: grub kyang zhes bya ba ni ma grub pa 'ga' zhig tu ni ma zad pa'o //
translated: Even if accomplished, he says, not only in some cases.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: rigs gzhan las zhes bya ba ste dmangs rigs la sogs ba ba'i rigs las bram ze'i rigs nyid tha dad pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rigs gzhan las zhes bya ba ste dmangs rigs la sogs ba ba'i rigs las bram ze'i rigs nyid tha dad pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no difference in the caste of a Brahmin, etc., from the caste of a Shudra, etc.

original: gang gis chos la sogs pa'i sgrub bar byed pa nyid du bye brag tu nges par 'gyur ba rang gi ngo bo grub kyang rigs rnam phan tshun tha dad pa ni ma yin te rnam ba thams cad kyis stong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang gis chos la sogs pa'i sgrub bar byed pa nyid du bye brag tu nges par 'gyur ba rang gi ngo bo grub kyang rigs rnam phan tshun tha dad pa ni ma yin te rnam ba thams cad kyis stong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Even if the intrinsic reality of the caste of a Brahmin, etc., were established, it would not be different from the caste of a Shudra, etc., because it is empty of all aspects.

original: de bzhin du zhes bya ba ni bye brag tu'o ;
analyzed: de bzhin du zhes bya ba ni bye brag tu'o ;
translated: Just as, etc.

original: / spyi nyid ci ste mi rtogs snyam na /
analyzed: / spyi nyid ci ste mi rtogs snyam na /
translated: If you think that a universal is not apprehended,

original: gzhal bya'i rnam pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gzhal bya'i rnam pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: it is said, ‚Äúthe form of the object of knowledge.‚Äù

original: 'on te spyi'i rnam pa can ni rtogs pa ni med pa kho na'o snyam na /
analyzed: 'on te spyi'i rnam pa can ni rtogs pa ni med pa kho na'o snyam na /
translated: If you think that the form of a universal is not apprehended at all,

original: spyi'i rnam pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: spyi'i rnam pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
translated: it is said, ‚Äúthe form of a universal.‚Äù

original: sngar bstan pa nyid do zhes bya ba ni mtshungs pa'i rnam par rtog pa gang zhes bya ba la sogs pas so //
analyzed: sngar bstan pa nyid do zhes bya ba ni mtshungs pa'i rnam par rtog pa gang zhes bya ba la sogs pas so //
translated: This has already been explained, i.e., by the passage beginning, ‚ÄúWhat is a similar conceptualization?‚Äù

original: spyi tha mi dad ba sun 'byin pa ni snang ba'i rang bzhin la yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: spyi tha mi dad ba sun 'byin pa ni snang ba'i rang bzhin la yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The refutation of the non-difference of the general is ‚Äúthe nature of appearance.‚Äù

original: de'i phyir gcig ni yul gzhan la sogs pa dang ldan par 'gal ba'i phyir ma nges pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir gcig ni yul gzhan la sogs pa dang ldan par 'gal ba'i phyir ma nges pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, because it is contradictory for one to possess another object, etc., it is not indeterminate.

original: ma grub pa nyid kyang ma yin no zhes ston pa'i don du phyogs snga ma 'god pa ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ma grub pa nyid kyang ma yin no zhes ston pa'i don du phyogs snga ma 'god pa ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: In order to demonstrate that it is not unestablished, the prior position is set forth: ‚ÄúIf it is said . . .‚Äù

original: gsal ba gcig gi mthar thug pa'i phyir te rang bzhin gzhan gyis stong ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gsal ba gcig gi mthar thug pa'i phyir te rang bzhin gzhan gyis stong ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'o //
translated: because it is the limit of one manifestation, because it is empty of another nature.

original: thal ba sgrub par byed pa zhes bya ba ni thal ba ni 'thob pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir dang / sgrub par byed pa yang ldog pa'i 'bras bu can yin ba dang / 'brel pa'i rtsa ba can yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thal ba sgrub par byed pa zhes bya ba ni thal ba ni 'thob pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir dang / sgrub par byed pa yang ldog pa'i 'bras bu can yin ba dang / 'brel pa'i rtsa ba can yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúThe proof of the reductio‚Äù is because the reductio has the nature of obtaining, because the proof has the effect of reversal, and because it has the root of the relation.

original: des na zhes bya ba ni thal ba bsgrub pa'i dus na'o //
analyzed: des na zhes bya ba ni thal ba bsgrub pa'i dus na'o //
translated: ‚ÄúTherefore‚Äù means at the time of proving the reductio.

original: ci ltar 'di thal ba'i sgrub pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci ltar 'di thal ba'i sgrub pa yin zhe na /
translated: How is this the proof of the reductio?

original: gal te zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba ste /
translated: ‚ÄúIf it is said . . .‚Äù

original: gal te khyab bya 'dir 'gyur na /
analyzed: gal te khyab bya 'dir 'gyur na /
translated: If the pervaded is here,

original: khyab par byed pa 'dir yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: khyab par byed pa 'dir yang 'gyur ro //
translated: then the pervader is here.

original: 'on te khyab par byed par 'gyur ba min na /
analyzed: 'on te khyab par byed par 'gyur ba min na /
translated: But if the pervader is not here,

original: khyab bya dang khyab byed gnyi ga'ang mi 'gyur ro zhes 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khyab bya dang khyab byed gnyi ga'ang mi 'gyur ro zhes 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: then neither the pervaded nor the pervader are here.

original: des na 'dis ni thal ba'i sgrub par byed pa yin no zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: des na 'dis ni thal ba'i sgrub par byed pa yin no zhes dgongs pa'o //
translated: Therefore, this is the proof by reductio.

original: bshad zin pa'i don nyid khyad par la sbyor ba ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bshad zin pa'i don nyid khyad par la sbyor ba ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The application of the meaning already explained to the specific case is ‚ÄúIf . . . then . . . ‚Äù

original: 'di ltar thal ba dang bzlog pa gnyis kyi sa ni gzhan gyis yongs su brtags pa la 'gal ba brjod par bya ba tsam zhig zad kyi //üîΩ'di nyid la sangs rgyas pa'i @25a * //
analyzed: 'di ltar thal ba dang bzlog pa gnyis kyi sa ni gzhan gyis yongs su brtags pa la 'gal ba brjod par bya ba tsam zhig zad kyi // 'di nyid la sangs rgyas pa'i @25a * //
translated: Thus, the reductio and the reverse of it are merely stated in order to show the contradiction in the opponent‚Äôs conception of the pervaded and the pervader.

original: grub pa'i mtha'i sgrub par byed pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: grub pa'i mtha'i sgrub par byed pa ni ma yin no //
translated: But this is not a proof of the Buddhist philosophical position.

original: de kho nar sgrub par byed pa nyid du khas ma blangs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de kho nar sgrub par byed pa nyid du khas ma blangs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because it is not accepted as a proof of the way things really are.

original: gzhi ma grub pa ni de kho na nyid du gtan tshigs yin pa bshad par mdzad pa bzhed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhi ma grub pa ni de kho na nyid du gtan tshigs yin pa bshad par mdzad pa bzhed pa ma yin no //
translated: The master NƒÅgƒÅrjuna does not assert that a nonexistent is a logical reason in reality.

original: rnam pa 'dis kyang spyi la sogs pa bzlog pa ni 'grub ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam pa 'dis kyang spyi la sogs pa bzlog pa ni 'grub ba'i phyir ro //
translated: This mode also establishes the refutation of universals and so on.

original: slob dpon chos mchog la sogs pa'i lugs bzlog pa ni phyis 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: slob dpon chos mchog la sogs pa'i lugs bzlog pa ni phyis 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: The refutation of the system of the master Dharmottara and so on will be explained later.

original: gsal ba gcig mthar thug pa zhes bya ba 'di la ni rnam par nges pa 'di nyid slob dpon gyis thal ba'i gtan tshigs su bzhed pa yin no zhes ston pa'o //
analyzed: gsal ba gcig mthar thug pa zhes bya ba 'di la ni rnam par nges pa 'di nyid slob dpon gyis thal ba'i gtan tshigs su bzhed pa yin no zhes ston pa'o //
translated: This very ascertainment that a single instance is final is what the master NƒÅgƒÅrjuna asserts as a reductio argument.

original: gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rtsod pa'o //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rtsod pa'o //
translated: The argument begins with ‚ÄúIf you say . . .‚Äù

original: thal ba thams cad ni thal ba bzlog pa'i mthar thug pa'i phyir na 'di yang bzlog pa'i mthar thug par 'gyur dgos so //
analyzed: thal ba thams cad ni thal ba bzlog pa'i mthar thug pa'i phyir na 'di yang bzlog pa'i mthar thug par 'gyur dgos so //
translated: Since all reductio arguments are final, this one must also be final.

original: 'di ni gsal pa gcig gi mthar thugs pa'i phyir gzhan dang ldan ba ma yin no zhes bya ba ni thal ba yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni gsal pa gcig gi mthar thugs pa'i phyir gzhan dang ldan ba ma yin no zhes bya ba ni thal ba yin no //
translated: The reductio is this: since a single instance is final, it is not associated with another.

original: 'di'i bzlog ba ston pa ni /
analyzed: 'di'i bzlog ba ston pa ni /
translated: The presentation of its reversal is this:

original: gal te gzhan dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te gzhan dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If it is said that it is possessed by another,

original: de'i tshe ni grub pa yang sgrub pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i tshe ni grub pa yang sgrub pa yin no //
translated: then at that time, what is already established is established again.üîΩThis fault does not exist, etc.

original: skyon 'di ni med de zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gzhan gyi mngon bar 'dod ba gsal ba du ma'i mthar thug pa nyid sun 'byin pa'o //
analyzed: skyon 'di ni med de zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gzhan gyi mngon bar 'dod ba gsal ba du ma'i mthar thug pa nyid sun 'byin pa'o //
translated: That is, he refutes the other's belief that the universal is the final end of many particulars.

original: de ni zhes bya ba ni spyi'o //
analyzed: de ni zhes bya ba ni spyi'o //
translated: That is, the universal.

original: gal te spyi khyab pa yin pa de lta na yang khyab pa ma yin pa'i rang bzhin du 'dzin pa yin no snyam na /
analyzed: gal te spyi khyab pa yin pa de lta na yang khyab pa ma yin pa'i rang bzhin du 'dzin pa yin no snyam na /
translated: If the universal is all-pervading, then it is apprehended as having a nature that is not all-pervading.

original: de'i ngo bo zhes bya ba smos te khyab pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: de'i ngo bo zhes bya ba smos te khyab pa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: He says, Its nature, i.e., the nature of the universal.

original: gzhan gyis zhes bya ba ni ma khyab pa'i'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyis zhes bya ba ni ma khyab pa'i'o //
translated: By another, i.e., by the non-pervading particulars.

original: 'on te spyi ni khyab pa nyid du rtogs pa kho na'o snyam na /
analyzed: 'on te spyi ni khyab pa nyid du rtogs pa kho na'o snyam na /
translated: But if it is thought that the universal is only understood as all-pervading,

original: gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: then he says, If it is all-pervading, etc.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: khyab par bya ba zhes bya ba'o //üîΩkhyab par bya ba ni gsal ba yin la /
analyzed: khyab par bya ba zhes bya ba'o // khyab par bya ba ni gsal ba yin la /
translated: He says, because it is the pervaded.üîΩThe particulars are the pervaded,

original: khyab par byed pa ni spyi yin te /
analyzed: khyab par byed pa ni spyi yin te /
translated: and the universal is the pervader,

original: gsal ba mtha' dag khyab pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gsal ba mtha' dag khyab pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the universal pervades all the particulars.

original: rtogs pa yang med do zhes bya ba ni khyab bya'o //
analyzed: rtogs pa yang med do zhes bya ba ni khyab bya'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThere is no cognition‚Äù is the pervaded.

original: de lta bu zhes bya ba ni khyab pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: de lta bu zhes bya ba ni khyab pa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: ‚ÄúSuch‚Äù is the pervader.

original: dngos po'i nyes pa 'di ni rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po la sogs pa la yang mtshungs so //
analyzed: dngos po'i nyes pa 'di ni rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po la sogs pa la yang mtshungs so //
translated: This fault of the thing is the same for the entity of cause and effect, etc.

original: des na zhes bya ba ni khyab par byed pa ma yin pa nyid kyis so //
analyzed: des na zhes bya ba ni khyab par byed pa ma yin pa nyid kyis so //
translated: ‚ÄúTherefore‚Äù is because of not being the pervader.

original: chos gnyi ga zhes bya ba ni bsal ba gcig gi mthar thug pa dang / yul la sogs pa gzhan dang mi ldan pa med pa'i rang bzhin gyi chos so //
analyzed: chos gnyi ga zhes bya ba ni bsal ba gcig gi mthar thug pa dang / yul la sogs pa gzhan dang mi ldan pa med pa'i rang bzhin gyi chos so //
translated: ‚ÄúBoth properties‚Äù are the property of the absence of the finality of a single exclusion and the absence of the property of not possessing another object, etc.

original: gal te de ltar yin na chos can ma grub pa'i lan ci ltar yin zhe na /
analyzed: gal te de ltar yin na chos can ma grub pa'i lan ci ltar yin zhe na /
translated: If it is like that, how is it a response to the nonestablishment of the property possessor?

original: gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIf‚Äù is the response.

original: 'o na @25b 'dis ci zhig bya snyam na /
analyzed: 'o na @25b 'dis ci zhig bya snyam na /
translated: If you think, ‚ÄúWhat is the point of this?‚Äù

original: 'di ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThis‚Äù is the response.

original: kho bo cag ni sangs rgyas pa'o //
analyzed: kho bo cag ni sangs rgyas pa'o //
translated: We are Buddhists.

original: de lta bur gyur pa zhes bya ba ni cha med du ma la khyab pa'o //
analyzed: de lta bur gyur pa zhes bya ba ni cha med du ma la khyab pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúSuch‚Äù is the pervasion of the partless many.

original: gzhan zhes bya ba ni spyi las gzhan gnyi ga las grub pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan zhes bya ba ni spyi las gzhan gnyi ga las grub pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúOther‚Äù is the establishment from both, other than the universal.

original: ma mthong ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni mngon sum med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma mthong ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni mngon sum med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúBecause it is not seen‚Äù means because it is not directly perceived.üîΩIf you think that inference is the proof of universals,

original: 'o na rjes su dpag pa spyi'i sgrub par byed par 'gyur ro snyam na /üîΩrjes su dpag pa ni zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'o na rjes su dpag pa spyi'i sgrub par byed par 'gyur ro snyam na / rjes su dpag pa ni zhes bya'o //
translated: [we reply:] ‚ÄúInference is not a proof of universals.‚Äù

original: gzhan du mi 'thad pa zhes bya ba ni rjes su 'gro ba'i rnam pa'i rtog pa gzhan du mi 'thad pas spyi lkog tu gyur ba brtag par bya ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan du mi 'thad pa zhes bya ba ni rjes su 'gro ba'i rnam pa'i rtog pa gzhan du mi 'thad pas spyi lkog tu gyur ba brtag par bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúBecause it is not tenable in any other way‚Äù means that it is not tenable that the conception of the form of a universal occurs in any other way. Therefore, a universal is something to be imagined.

original: don thams cad dang zhes bya ba ni lus can gyi dngos po'i chos du ma nyid la sogs pa de dang mi mthun pa nyid do //
analyzed: don thams cad dang zhes bya ba ni lus can gyi dngos po'i chos du ma nyid la sogs pa de dang mi mthun pa nyid do //
translated: ‚ÄúBecause it is contradictory to all objects‚Äù means that it is contradictory to the many properties of physical things, such as being many.

original: de la ni spyi la'o //
analyzed: de la ni spyi la'o //
translated: A universal is contradictory to those.

original: gzhan gyi chos zhes bya ba ni lus can gyi dngos po'i chos du ma nyid 'gal bas so //
analyzed: gzhan gyi chos zhes bya ba ni lus can gyi dngos po'i chos du ma nyid 'gal bas so //
translated: ‚ÄúBecause it is contradictory to other properties‚Äù means that it is contradictory to the many properties of physical things.

original: 'gal bas ni dum la 'jug pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'gal bas ni dum la 'jug pa nyid do //
