original: gzhan du mi 'thad pa'i nyes pa des na de ni spyi 'grub pa ma yin no zhes bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: gzhan du mi 'thad pa'i nyes pa des na de ni spyi 'grub pa ma yin no zhes bstan pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is not a general proof.

original: lus can ma yin pa nyid kyang khyab pa sgrub par byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: lus can ma yin pa nyid kyang khyab pa sgrub par byed pa ma yin te /
translated: Non-embodiment is not a proof of the pervasion,

original: ma nges pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma nges pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not certain.

original: tha ma'i khyad par ni lus can ma yin yang ma khyab par rig ba can gyis 'dod pa yin no //
analyzed: tha ma'i khyad par ni lus can ma yin yang ma khyab par rig ba can gyis 'dod pa yin no //
translated: The NaiyƒÅyikas accept that even though it is not embodied, it is not pervaded.

original: 'o na ni 'di ma khyab pa'i sgrub par byed par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ni 'di ma khyab pa'i sgrub par byed par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: Well, then, it would be a proof of non-pervasion.

original: de bzhin zhes smos te tha ma'i khyad par bzhin du'o //
analyzed: de bzhin zhes smos te tha ma'i khyad par bzhin du'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúthus‚Äù means ‚Äúlike the particular.‚Äù

original: 'di na 'khrul pa'i phyir gnyi ga'i sgrub par byed pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //üîΩde ni zhes bya ba ni khyad par gyi tshig gi don to //
analyzed: 'di na 'khrul pa'i phyir gnyi ga'i sgrub par byed pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to // de ni zhes bya ba ni khyad par gyi tshig gi don to //
translated: Here, it is not a proof of either because it is mistaken.üîΩ‚ÄúThat‚Äù refers to the meaning of the word ‚Äúparticular.‚Äù

original: de nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba ni khyad par gyi tshig gi don nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba ni khyad par gyi tshig gi don nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúFor that very reason‚Äù means ‚Äúfor the reason of the meaning of the word ‚Äòparticular.‚Äô‚Äù

original: rnam par dbye bzhes bya ba ni lus can nyid kyis byas pa'i ma khyab pa dang lus can ma yin pas byas pa'i khyab pa nyid ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: rnam par dbye bzhes bya ba ni lus can nyid kyis byas pa'i ma khyab pa dang lus can ma yin pas byas pa'i khyab pa nyid ces bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúDivision‚Äù means that which is not pervaded by being embodied, and that which is pervaded by not being embodied.

original: ci'i phyir rnam par dbye ba 'dis des ma byas she na khyab pa dang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ci'i phyir rnam par dbye ba 'dis des ma byas she na khyab pa dang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Why is it not done by this division? It is pervasion.

original: khyab pa'i sgrub par byed pa ni spyi yin la /
analyzed: khyab pa'i sgrub par byed pa ni spyi yin la /
translated: The proof of pervasion is a universal.

original: ma khyab pa'i sgrub par byed pa ni khyad par yin no //
analyzed: ma khyab pa'i sgrub par byed pa ni khyad par yin no //
translated: The proof of non-pervasion is a particular.

original: pha rol po phyogs 'di khas len pa'i dogs pa bsu ba ni yin mod ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: pha rol po phyogs 'di khas len pa'i dogs pa bsu ba ni yin mod ces bya ba'o //
translated: The opponent's doubt about accepting this position is it is true.

original: ma grub pa zhes bya ba ni grub pa'i mtha'o //
analyzed: ma grub pa zhes bya ba ni grub pa'i mtha'o //
translated: Unestablished refers to a philosophical tenet.

original: bsgrub par bya ba ni grub pas bsgrub bya rtogs par byed pa'o //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba ni grub pas bsgrub bya rtogs par byed pa'o //
translated: The probandum is established by the proof.

original: de la khra bo la sogs pa la ma khyab pa'i sgrub par byed pa khyad par gyi @26a * //
analyzed: de la khra bo la sogs pa la ma khyab pa'i sgrub par byed pa khyad par gyi @26a * //
translated: In that case, the proof of non-pervasion in variegated and so on is the particular nature.

original: rang bzhin grub pa'i phyir grub par byed pa de la ni rtsod pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: rang bzhin grub pa'i phyir grub par byed pa de la ni rtsod pa ma yin gyi /
translated: Because it is established, there is no dispute about that proof.

original: spyi'i rang bzhin gyi sgrub bar byed pa ni ma grub ste /
analyzed: spyi'i rang bzhin gyi sgrub bar byed pa ni ma grub ste /
translated: The reason that is a universal is not established.

original: nges na bsgrub bar bya ba khyab pa nyid ci ltar go bar byed /
analyzed: nges na bsgrub bar bya ba khyab pa nyid ci ltar go bar byed /
translated: If it is ascertained, how can the probandum be pervaded?

original: pha rol bo ma grub pa nyid yod pa ni spyi ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: pha rol bo ma grub pa nyid yod pa ni spyi ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The existence of the nonestablished opponent is the universal.

original: sun 'byin pa ni de ni ma yin te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: sun 'byin pa ni de ni ma yin te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The refutation is ‚Äúthat is not so.‚Äù

original: khyab pa nyid ma bzung na spyi ltar ci'i rang bzhin bzung bar brjod /
analyzed: khyab pa nyid ma bzung na spyi ltar ci'i rang bzhin bzung bar brjod /
translated: If the pervasion is not grasped, how can the nature of the universal be grasped?

original: 'dis ni bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa dag phan tshun brten pa'i phyir na gcig kyang ma grub po zhes bstan to //
analyzed: 'dis ni bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa dag phan tshun brten pa'i phyir na gcig kyang ma grub po zhes bstan to //
translated: This shows that because the probandum and the proof are mutually dependent, neither is established.

original: 'on te gzhan la mi ltos pa'i rang bzhin gyis 'dzin pa'i phyir nyes pa 'di med do zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te gzhan la mi ltos pa'i rang bzhin gyis 'dzin pa'i phyir nyes pa 'di med do zhe na /
translated: But if you say that this fault does not arise because it is grasped by a nature that does not depend on another,

original: gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: then it is as follows.

original: gal te spyi de gsal ba du ma la khyab pa'i rang bzhin la ma ltos par 'dzin na de'i tshe rang gi ngo bo 'dzin pa de'i phyir ci ltar spyi bzung ste ma yin pa kho na'o //
analyzed: gal te spyi de gsal ba du ma la khyab pa'i rang bzhin la ma ltos par 'dzin na de'i tshe rang gi ngo bo 'dzin pa de'i phyir ci ltar spyi bzung ste ma yin pa kho na'o //
translated: If that universal is grasped without depending on the nature that pervades many instances, then at that time it is grasped by its own nature. Therefore, how can the universal be grasped? It cannot be grasped at all.

original: bsal ba du ma la khyab pa'i rang bzhin ma rtogs pa ni spyi la de ltar rtogs par 'gyur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: bsal ba du ma la khyab pa'i rang bzhin ma rtogs pa ni spyi la de ltar rtogs par 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: The non-apprehension of the nature of the many exclusions is not the apprehension of the universal.

original: des na spyi'i rang bzhin ni ma grub pa'o //
analyzed: des na spyi'i rang bzhin ni ma grub pa'o //
translated: Therefore, the universal is not established.

original: spyi zhes bya ba ni 'chad pa'o //
analyzed: spyi zhes bya ba ni 'chad pa'o //
translated: The so-called universal is explained.

original: cig shos su zhes bya ba ni khyab pa ma yin pa'i rang bzhin du'o //
analyzed: cig shos su zhes bya ba ni khyab pa ma yin pa'i rang bzhin du'o //
translated: The other is the non-pervading nature.

original: de la phyogs dang po dogs par byas nas 'gog pa ni khyab pa nyid du zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de la phyogs dang po dogs par byas nas 'gog pa ni khyab pa nyid du zhes bya ba'o //
translated: There, having raised the first position, the refutation is ‚Äúif it is the pervader.

original: phyogs gnyis pa bkod nas sel ba ni 'on te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: phyogs gnyis pa bkod nas sel ba ni 'on te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Having set forth the second position, the exclusion is ‚Äúif, on the other hand.

original: gal te de ltar yin na nyes pa ci yod snyam na /
analyzed: gal te de ltar yin na nyes pa ci yod snyam na /
translated: If it is like that, what is the fault?

original: de ltar 'o na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de ltar 'o na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIn that case, then.

original: bsal pa gzhan gyi khyad par can du zhes bya ba ni spyi'o //
analyzed: bsal pa gzhan gyi khyad par can du zhes bya ba ni spyi'o //
translated: The exclusion is the qualifier of the other, i.e., the universal.

original: ci ltar rtogs zhes bya ba ni mngon sum gyis so //
analyzed: ci ltar rtogs zhes bya ba ni mngon sum gyis so //
translated: How is it apprehended? By direct perception.

original: 'o na te rnam pa de ltar rtogs pa ni mngon sum kho na yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na te rnam pa de ltar rtogs pa ni mngon sum kho na yin no zhe na /
translated: If it is apprehended in that way, it is direct perception itself.

original: de nyid 'di zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid 'di zhes bya ba'o //
translated: That itself is this.

original: spyi yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs ma grub pa'i mjug sdud pa ni de'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: spyi yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs ma grub pa'i mjug sdud pa ni de'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The conclusion of the unestablished reason, ‚Äúbecause of being a universal,‚Äù is ‚Äútherefore.‚Äù

original: skabs nye bar sdud pa ni de'i phyir bya ba'o //
analyzed: skabs nye bar sdud pa ni de'i phyir bya ba'o //
translated: The summary of the topic is ‚Äútherefore.‚Äù

original: lus can ma yin pa nyid ni sgrub par byed pa ma yin te 'khrul pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lus can ma yin pa nyid ni sgrub par byed pa ma yin te 'khrul pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Non-embodiment is not a proof because it is mistaken.

original: spyi yang ma yin te ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: spyi yang ma yin te ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Nor is it a universal because it is not established.

original: gal te pha rol po la de'i sgrub par byed pa med de de ltar na yang sangs rgyas ba la gnod par byed pa ni tshad ma ci zhig yod snyam na /
analyzed: gal te pha rol po la de'i sgrub par byed pa med de de ltar na yang sangs rgyas ba la gnod par byed pa ni tshad ma ci zhig yod snyam na /
translated: If the opponent has no proof of that, then what valid cognition contradicts the Buddha?

original: mngon sum gyis kyang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: mngon sum gyis kyang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is said, ‚ÄúEven by direct perception.‚Äù

original: 'dis ni snang ba mi dmigs pas gnod par brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dis ni snang ba mi dmigs pas gnod par brjod pa yin no //
translated: This expresses contradiction by the non-observation of appearance.

original: gal te zhes bya ba ni rtsod pa'o //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba ni rtsod pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIf‚Äù is a hypothetical.

original: khyab pa ma yin par sgrub ces bya ba ni gsal @26b ba gcig gi mthar thug pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i sgrub par byed pas so //
analyzed: khyab pa ma yin par sgrub ces bya ba ni gsal @26b ba gcig gi mthar thug pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i sgrub par byed pas so //
translated: ‚ÄúIt is not established as a pervasion‚Äù is by the proof ‚Äúbecause of being limited to one instance.‚Äù

original: de la ni spyi la'o //
analyzed: de la ni spyi la'o //
translated: There, it is a universal.

original: chos ni ma khyab pa nyid do //
analyzed: chos ni ma khyab pa nyid do //
translated: The property is not pervaded.

original: de ni zhes bya ba la lan no //
analyzed: de ni zhes bya ba la lan no //
translated: ‚Äú That‚Äù refers to the reply.

original: rtsa ba zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyis khas blangs pa la mi ltos pa'o //
analyzed: rtsa ba zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyis khas blangs pa la mi ltos pa'o //
translated: ‚Äú Root‚Äù means not depending on the acceptance of others.

original: de nyid gsal 'debs pa ni khyod ces bya ba ste rigs pa can la sogs pa'o ;
analyzed: de nyid gsal 'debs pa ni khyod ces bya ba ste rigs pa can la sogs pa'o ;
translated: ‚Äú You‚Äù is a reminder of that.

original: / mngon sum dang de la sogs pa zhes bya ba rjes su dpag pas so //
analyzed: / mngon sum dang de la sogs pa zhes bya ba rjes su dpag pas so //
translated: ‚Äú Perception and so on‚Äù refers to inference.

original: gzhan zhes bya ba ni tha mi dad pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan zhes bya ba ni tha mi dad pa'o //
translated: ‚Äú Other‚Äù means non-different.

original: rnam pa nyid ces bya ba ni yan lag gi bkod pa'o //
analyzed: rnam pa nyid ces bya ba ni yan lag gi bkod pa'o //
translated: ‚Äú Form‚Äù means the arrangement of parts.

original: rnam pa ni spyi ma yin te /
analyzed: rnam pa ni spyi ma yin te /
translated: Form is not the universal,

original: khyab pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khyab pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not pervaded.

original: 'on te rnam pa ni khyab pa nyid du dmigs pa kho na'o zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te rnam pa ni khyab pa nyid du dmigs pa kho na'o zhe na /
translated: But if form is only observed as pervasion,

original: des na ci ltar ma khyab snyam na /
analyzed: des na ci ltar ma khyab snyam na /
translated: then how is it not pervaded?

original: khyab pa nyid du zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: khyab pa nyid du zhes gsungs so //
translated: ‚Äú Pervasion‚Äù is stated.

original: 'di nyid kyi don gsal bar byed pa ni de ltar yin dang zhes bya ba ste khyab pa nyid du dmigs na yang ngo //
analyzed: 'di nyid kyi don gsal bar byed pa ni de ltar yin dang zhes bya ba ste khyab pa nyid du dmigs na yang ngo //
translated: This clarifies the meaning. ‚Äú If it were‚Äù means even if pervasion is observed.

original: de'i phyir rnam pa ni spyi ni dmigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir rnam pa ni spyi ni dmigs pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore form is not the observed object of the universal.

original: gtan tshigs 'di ni ma grub pa yang ma yin no zhes brjod pa ni ;
analyzed: gtan tshigs 'di ni ma grub pa yang ma yin no zhes brjod pa ni ;
translated: This reason is not unestablished.

original: rnam pa ni gsal ba'i rang bzhin yin pas de grub na de'i rang bzhin gyi rnam pa yang grub pa kho na'o //
analyzed: rnam pa ni gsal ba'i rang bzhin yin pas de grub na de'i rang bzhin gyi rnam pa yang grub pa kho na'o //
translated: The aspect is the nature of manifestation, so when that is established, the aspect that has that as its nature is certainly established.

original: des na gtan tshigs gsal ba gcig gi mthar thug pa nyid ma khyab pa nyid du bsgrub pa'i don du nye bar bkod pa ni gzhi ma grub pa ma yin no //
analyzed: des na gtan tshigs gsal ba gcig gi mthar thug pa nyid ma khyab pa nyid du bsgrub pa'i don du nye bar bkod pa ni gzhi ma grub pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the reason, the single final manifestation, is not unestablished in terms of the meaning to be proven, non-pervasion.

original: gal te phyogs 'di la chos can ma grub ba nyid spangs pa yin na 'o na ci ltar zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi'o //
analyzed: gal te phyogs 'di la chos can ma grub ba nyid spangs pa yin na 'o na ci ltar zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi'o //
translated: If this position avoids the fault of the subject being unestablished, then how is it? This is the opponent's question.

original: rnam pa spyi yin pa'i phyogs la ni phyogs kyi chos nyid kyang yod pa nyid de des na tshul gsum dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam pa spyi yin pa'i phyogs la ni phyogs kyi chos nyid kyang yod pa nyid de des na tshul gsum dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: In the position where the aspect is a universal, the property of the subject does exist, and therefore it possesses the three modes.

original: gang gis 'di thal ba'i sgrub par byed pa ma yin no zhes brjod na /
analyzed: gang gis 'di thal ba'i sgrub par byed pa ma yin no zhes brjod na /
translated: If it is said that this is not a proof by reductio,

original: ci ltar 'di sgrub par byed pa nyid ma yin zhe na ;
analyzed: ci ltar 'di sgrub par byed pa nyid ma yin zhe na ;
translated: how is it not a proof?

original: grub pa'i mtha' smra bas /
analyzed: grub pa'i mtha' smra bas /
translated: The proponent of the conclusion says:

original: pha rol pos ni zhes gsungs so //üîΩrgol ba gcig gis ni dbyibs kyi mtshan nyid rnam pa nyid spyi yin par brjod la /
analyzed: pha rol pos ni zhes gsungs so // rgol ba gcig gis ni dbyibs kyi mtshan nyid rnam pa nyid spyi yin par brjod la /
translated: The opponent says:üîΩOne opponent says that the definition of shape is a universal.

original: rigs pa la sogs pa gzhan gyis ni rnam pa las gzhan rigs yin par brjod do //
analyzed: rigs pa la sogs pa gzhan gyis ni rnam pa las gzhan rigs yin par brjod do //
translated: Another opponent, such as Bhadraya·πáƒ´, says that the universal is different from the shape.

original: des na spyi tha dad par smra ba'i dbang du byas nas thal ba grub par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: des na spyi tha dad par smra ba'i dbang du byas nas thal ba grub par byed pa yin te /
translated: Therefore, the reductio is presented from the perspective of those who advocate that universals are different.

original: gzhi ma grub pa'i phyir ro zhes brjod do //
analyzed: gzhi ma grub pa'i phyir ro zhes brjod do //
translated: The reason is not established.

original: ci tha mi dad par smra ba la ltos nas ni rang rgyud kyi sgrub par byed pa kho na'o //
analyzed: ci tha mi dad par smra ba la ltos nas ni rang rgyud kyi sgrub par byed pa kho na'o //
translated: But from the perspective of those who advocate that universals are not different, it is an autonomous argument.

original: de ltar na re zhig gang yang rung ba'i lugs la gsal ba gcig gi mthar thug pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba 'di thal ba sgrub pa yin no zhes gzhung @27a * //
analyzed: de ltar na re zhig gang yang rung ba'i lugs la gsal ba gcig gi mthar thug pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba 'di thal ba sgrub pa yin no zhes gzhung @27a * //
translated: Thus, in either system, the reductio is presented as follows: ‚ÄúIt follows that there is no point to the final existence of a single manifestation because of the reason.‚Äù

original: btsugs pa yin no //
analyzed: btsugs pa yin no //
translated: This is the thesis.

original: gsal pa gcig gi mthar thug pa nyid dgag par bsgrub par bya ba la ni /
analyzed: gsal pa gcig gi mthar thug pa nyid dgag par bsgrub par bya ba la ni /
translated: In order to prove the negation of the final existence of a single manifestation,

original: khyab pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i sgrub par byed pa rgol pa gnyi ga'i lugs kyis ma grub pa'i phyir na thal ba sgrub pa yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir yang na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: khyab pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i sgrub par byed pa rgol pa gnyi ga'i lugs kyis ma grub pa'i phyir na thal ba sgrub pa yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir yang na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúbecause‚Äù is a reason that is not established according to the system of either the defender or the challenger, and so it is a reductio. The word ‚Äúor‚Äù is used to indicate that.

original: khyab pa'i phyir zhes bya ba 'di 'gal ba yin par ni du ma la 'jug pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba 'dis brjod pa yin la /
analyzed: khyab pa'i phyir zhes bya ba 'di 'gal ba yin par ni du ma la 'jug pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba 'dis brjod pa yin la /
translated: The word ‚Äúbecause‚Äù is contradictory, because it is applied to many things. This is expressed by the phrase ‚Äúbecause of engaging in many things.‚Äù

original: 'di ni spyi gnyi ga'i phyogs la yang ma grub po //üîΩgcig pa gcig gi mthar thug par dgag pa ni thal ba yin par lhag mas brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni spyi gnyi ga'i phyogs la yang ma grub po // gcig pa gcig gi mthar thug par dgag pa ni thal ba yin par lhag mas brjod pa yin no //
translated: This is not established according to the system of either the challenger or the defender.üîΩThe remainder of the verse expresses the fact that the reductio is a negation that ends in the negation of one thing.

original: bzlog pa ni rtsa ba'i gtan tshigs yin no zhes bya ba ni bsal ba gcig gi mthar thug par yang dmigs pa yin no zhes bya ba ni grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bzlog pa ni rtsa ba'i gtan tshigs yin no zhes bya ba ni bsal ba gcig gi mthar thug par yang dmigs pa yin no zhes bya ba ni grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The reversed form of the original argument is the reason. The phrase ‚Äúbecause of the perception of one thing‚Äù is established.

original: gal te thal ba'i sgrub byed sgrub byed ma yin pa nyid yin na'o na nges ci zhig bya ba yin snyam na /
analyzed: gal te thal ba'i sgrub byed sgrub byed ma yin pa nyid yin na'o na nges ci zhig bya ba yin snyam na /
translated: If the reason of the reductio is not a reason, then what is it?

original: thal ba ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: thal ba ni zhes bya ba'o //

analyzed: slob dpon chos mchog la sogs pa'i lugs sun da byung ba'i don du nye bar 'god pa ni gzhan dag ni zhes bya ba'o //

analyzed: bral ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni rnam nges kyi dkyus dum bu'o //

analyzed: de ni grub pa nyid do zhes phyi ma dang 'brel to //
translated: ‚ÄúThat is established‚Äù is connected to the latter.

original: gang gi tshe zhe na /
analyzed: gang gi tshe zhe na /

analyzed: spyir dngos po med pa yin na yang ngo // gtan tshigs dngos med tsam yin na zhes bya ba ni /

original: bral ba tsam khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa yin pa na'o //
analyzed: bral ba tsam khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa yin pa na'o //
translated: means that mere absence is the pervader when the non-observation of the imperceptible is the reason.

original: de zhes bya ba bral ba tsam ni chos can gang dang yang ngo //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba bral ba tsam ni chos can gang dang yang ngo //
translated: ‚ÄúThat‚Äù refers to mere absence, which is not related to any subject.

original: spyi dngos po ma yin pa'i phyir sgrub par byed pa dang bral ba tsam de dang 'brel pa ma yin no //
analyzed: spyi dngos po ma yin pa'i phyir sgrub par byed pa dang bral ba tsam de dang 'brel pa ma yin no //
translated: Because the general is not a thing, the probandum is not related to mere absence.üîΩHow can it be the proof?

original: ci ltar bsgrub bya sgrub par byed pa yin zhes bya ba ni gzhi ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ci ltar bsgrub bya sgrub par byed pa yin zhes bya ba ni gzhi ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the basis is not established.

original: des na gzhi ma grub pa ni ;
analyzed: des na gzhi ma grub pa ni ;

analyzed: dngos po la tshul gsum pa nyid ma yin no zhes dgongs pa'o //

original: 'di snyam du bral ba tsam ni gtan tshigs ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di snyam du bral ba tsam ni gtan tshigs ma yin no //
translated: If you think that mere separation is not the reason,

original: 'o na ci zhe na /üîΩgsal ba gzhan dang 'brel pa'i rang bzhin gyi bral ba gtan tshigs yin no zhes pha rol po ston pa ni 'on te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na / gsal ba gzhan dang 'brel pa'i rang bzhin gyi bral ba gtan tshigs yin no zhes pha rol po ston pa ni 'on te zhes bya ba'o //

original: de'i tshe yang zhes bya ba ni grub pa'i mtha'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe yang zhes bya ba ni grub pa'i mtha'o //
translated: The opponent‚Äôs response is ‚ÄúBut if it is the separation of the nature of one thing from another thing that is the reason, then at that time . . .‚Äù

original: de'i phyir nges bar zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de'i phyir nges bar zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The response to that is ‚ÄúThen it follows . . .‚Äù

analyzed: de lta yin dang 'gal ba brjod pa nyid legs pa yin no zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o //

original: gzhan gyis ni mu stegs pa'i'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyis ni mu stegs pa'i'o //
translated: The other is the tƒ´rthikas.

original: gzhan gyis khas blangs pa ni /
analyzed: gzhan gyis khas blangs pa ni /
translated: The other‚Äôs assertion is

original: sangs rgyas pas khas blangs pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas pas khas blangs pa'o //
translated: the Buddhists‚Äô assertion.

original: gal te sangs rgyas bas mu stegs pa @27b la gzhan sel ba gsal ba gcig gi mthar thug pa'i phyir ma khyab par bsgrubs na de'i grub pa ma bsgrubs pa yin te /
analyzed: gal te sangs rgyas bas mu stegs pa @27b la gzhan sel ba gsal ba gcig gi mthar thug pa'i phyir ma khyab par bsgrubs na de'i grub pa ma bsgrubs pa yin te /
translated: If the Buddhists prove to the tƒ´rthikas that the reason is not included in the similar class because the exclusion of other is the ultimate of one thing, then that proof is not established.

analyzed: gzhan sel ba khyab pa ma yin par ni mu stegs pa rnams 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the tƒ´rthikas assert that exclusion is not a pervasion.

analyzed: sangs rgyas pa ni 'dod pa ma yin pa kho na'o zhes brjod pa ni gzhan yang zhes bya ba'o //

original: med pa bsgrub pa la rung ba zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi dogs pa'o //
analyzed: med pa bsgrub pa la rung ba zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi dogs pa'o //
translated: The opponent‚Äôs doubt is, ‚ÄúHow can it be suitable to prove a nonentity?‚Äù

original: ma yin te zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni lan no //
analyzed: ma yin te zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni lan no //
translated: The response is, ‚ÄúIt is not the case that it is not suitable.‚Äù

original: ci ltar shing dang shing sha ba dag de'i bdag nyid du grub pa na /
analyzed: ci ltar shing dang shing sha ba dag de'i bdag nyid du grub pa na /
translated: When a tree and a ≈õim≈õapƒÅ tree are established as being the same nature,

original: khyab par byed pa shing ma dmigs pas /
analyzed: khyab par byed pa shing ma dmigs pas /
translated: the pervasion is that if the pervader, the tree, is not observed,üîΩthe pervaded, the ≈õim≈õapƒÅ tree, is understood to be absent.

original: shing sha pa med par rtogs pa'i tshe shing nyid bsgrub pa la shing sha pa nyid rtsa ba'i gtan tshigs yin gyi /üîΩyul nye bar ma bstan pa can gyi khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa ni ma yin pa de bzhin du 'dir yang yin na /
analyzed: shing sha pa med par rtogs pa'i tshe shing nyid bsgrub pa la shing sha pa nyid rtsa ba'i gtan tshigs yin gyi / yul nye bar ma bstan pa can gyi khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa ni ma yin pa de bzhin du 'dir yang yin na /
translated: When that is the case, the ≈õim≈õapƒÅ tree itself is the fundamental reason that proves the tree.üîΩIt is not the case that the nonobservation of the pervader that does not indicate the object is the reason.

original: khyab par byed par byed pa mi dmigs pas mi mthun pa'i phyogs las bzlog pa /
analyzed: khyab par byed par byed pa mi dmigs pas mi mthun pa'i phyogs las bzlog pa /
translated: In the same way, here, when the nonobservation of the pervader is the reason, the opposite of the discordant sideüîΩis the probandum.

original: gsal ba gcig gi mthar thug pa'i phyir zhe'am /
analyzed: gsal ba gcig gi mthar thug pa'i phyir zhe'am /
translated: Because of the finality of a single clarity, or because of pervasion,

original: khyab pa yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba de lta bu'i rang bzhin bsgrub pa'i rang bzhin nyid rtsa ba'i gtan tshigs yin par 'gyur gyi khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: khyab pa yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba de lta bu'i rang bzhin bsgrub pa'i rang bzhin nyid rtsa ba'i gtan tshigs yin par 'gyur gyi khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa ni ma yin no //

original: de'i stobs kyis zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de'i stobs kyis zhes bya ba ni /

analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba'i sgo nas 'brel ba bzung ba'i stobs kyis so //

original: med pa tsam zhig nye bar ston te zhes bya ba ni khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pas so //
analyzed: med pa tsam zhig nye bar ston te zhes bya ba ni khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pas so //

analyzed: rtsa ba'i gtan tshigs ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni khyab byed mi dmigs pa'o //
translated: it is not the root reason means that the non-observation of the pervader is not the root reason.

original: 'dis ni / de dag med na'ang de med ces //
analyzed: 'dis ni / de dag med na'ang de med ces //
translated: This is stated in the line:

original: brjod pa las kyang de rtogs phyir //
analyzed: brjod pa las kyang de rtogs phyir //
translated: Because it is understood from the statementüîΩIf those do not exist, it does not exist.

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: This is stated in the line:

original: yul nye bar ma bstan pa can gyi khyab par byed par byed ba mi dmigs pa las ltos te brjod pa yin no zhes bstan to //
analyzed: yul nye bar ma bstan pa can gyi khyab par byed par byed ba mi dmigs pa las ltos te brjod pa yin no zhes bstan to //

analyzed: yod par bsgrub pa na ni tshul 'di nyid yin par rtogs par bya'o //

original: gal te zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi'o //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi'o //

original: bsgrub pa go bar byed pa 'ba' zhig tu ni ma zad de /
analyzed: bsgrub pa go bar byed pa 'ba' zhig tu ni ma zad de /

analyzed: khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa yang rtsa ba'i gtan tshigs yin no ;
translated: but also the non-apprehension of the pervader is the basic syllogism.

original: / so sor nges pa'i zhes bya ba ni yul nye bar bstan pa can no //
analyzed: / so sor nges pa'i zhes bya ba ni yul nye bar bstan pa can no //

original: de lta yin na zhes bya ba ni lan no //
analyzed: de lta yin na zhes bya ba ni lan no //

original: 'di na zhes bya ba ni sa phyogs la sogs par ro //
analyzed: 'di na zhes bya ba ni sa phyogs la sogs par ro //

original: gzhan zhes bya ba ni dngos por yod pa'i spyi'o //
analyzed: gzhan zhes bya ba ni dngos por yod pa'i spyi'o //
translated: The other is the universal of the existent thing.

original: 'dir yang zhes bya ba ni bral ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i sgrub par byed pa la yang ngo //
analyzed: 'dir yang zhes bya ba ni bral ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i sgrub par byed pa la yang ngo //
translated: Here also is in the proof because of the separation.

original: @28a * // dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i thun mong zhes bya ba ni spyi'o //
analyzed: @28a * // dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i thun mong zhes bya ba ni spyi'o //
translated: The common of the existent and the non-existent is the universal.

original: gzhan zhes bya ba ni dngos po dang dngos po med pa las tha dad pa med pa ste /
analyzed: gzhan zhes bya ba ni dngos po dang dngos po med pa las tha dad pa med pa ste /
translated: The other is the non-difference from the existent and the non-existent.

original: dngos po dang dngos po med pa la med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos po dang dngos po med pa la med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it does not exist in either an entity or a non-entity.

original: ba lang nyid ni dngos po'i rang bzhin nam dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin du nges par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: ba lang nyid ni dngos po'i rang bzhin nam dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin du nges par 'gyur gyi /
translated: The nature of a cow is ascertained as the nature of an entity or the nature of a non-entity.

original: dngos po'i rang bzhin gyi ba lang nyid la thun mong ba'i rang bzhin gzhan ni yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: dngos po'i rang bzhin gyi ba lang nyid la thun mong ba'i rang bzhin gzhan ni yod pa ma yin te /

original: spyi la ni spyi med do zhes bya ba gzhung lugs yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: spyi la ni spyi med do zhes bya ba gzhung lugs yin pa'i phyir ro //

original: gzhan med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs ma grub pa'i dogs pa bsu ba ni /
analyzed: gzhan med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs ma grub pa'i dogs pa bsu ba ni /
translated: The objection that the reason ‚Äúbecause another does not exist‚Äù is unestablished is anticipated in the words,

original: rnam par rtog pa yin zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa yin zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIt is a conceptual thought.‚Äù

original: phyi rol na gnas pa'i dngos po dang dngos po med pa la ni rnam par rtog pa'i snang ba thun mong ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: phyi rol na gnas pa'i dngos po dang dngos po med pa la ni rnam par rtog pa'i snang ba thun mong ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the appearance of a conceptual thought does not occur in common with regard to an external entity or non-entity.

analyzed: lan 'debs pa ni de lta na zhes bya ba'o //

original: rnam par rtog pa la snang ba'i chos can la dngos po'i nye bar len pa can ma yin pa bsgrub pa na snang ba mi dmigs pa kho na yin gyi khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa la snang ba'i chos can la dngos po'i nye bar len pa can ma yin pa bsgrub pa na snang ba mi dmigs pa kho na yin gyi khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa ni ma yin no //
translated: When proving the non-apprehension of the entity of a subject that appears to conceptual consciousness, it is only the non-apprehension of appearance that is relevant, not the non-apprehension of the pervader.

original: khyed kyis ni khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa nyid rtsa ba'i gtan tshigs su gzhung 'dzugs par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: khyed kyis ni khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa nyid rtsa ba'i gtan tshigs su gzhung 'dzugs par bya ba yin no //
translated: You, however, take the non-apprehension of the pervader itself to be the fundamental logical argument.

original: des na gzhan zos nas gzhan skyugs pa zhes bya ba'i tshul 'di ci yin /
analyzed: des na gzhan zos nas gzhan skyugs pa zhes bya ba'i tshul 'di ci yin /

original: mi dmigs pa ni snang ba mi dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa ni snang ba mi dmigs pa'o //
translated: Non-apprehension is the non-apprehension of appearance.

original: gzhan zhes bya ba ni khyab byed mi dmigs pa la ltos nas gzhan no //
analyzed: gzhan zhes bya ba ni khyab byed mi dmigs pa la ltos nas gzhan no //
translated: ‚ÄúAnother‚Äù is another in relation to the non-apprehension of the pervader.

original: de nas slob dpon chos mchog gis bzhed pa 'di ni gyi na'o //
analyzed: de nas slob dpon chos mchog gis bzhed pa 'di ni gyi na'o //
translated: Then this assertion of the master Dharmottara is wrong.

original: nye bar sdud pa ni de'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: nye bar sdud pa ni de'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The summary is ‚ÄúTherefore . . .‚Äù

original: 'dir zhes bya ba ni chos can spyi gsal ba las tha dad pa la /
analyzed: 'dir zhes bya ba ni chos can spyi gsal ba las tha dad pa la /
translated: Here, in relation to the general subject that is distinguished from the particular,

original: bral ba'i phyir zhes bya ba rtsa ba'i gtan tshigs ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: bral ba'i phyir zhes bya ba rtsa ba'i gtan tshigs ni ma yin gyi /
translated: ‚Äúbecause of being free from‚Äù is not the fundamental logical argument.

original: 'on kyang thal ba dang bzlog pa gnyi ga yang de kho nar gzhi ma grub pa'i phyir na 'gal ba ston par byed pa'i 'bras bu can yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang thal ba dang bzlog pa gnyi ga yang de kho nar gzhi ma grub pa'i phyir na 'gal ba ston par byed pa'i 'bras bu can yin no //
translated: However, since both the reductio and the reverse of the reductio are not established in reality, the reductio has the effect of revealing contradiction.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is this?

original: spyi zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: spyi zhes gsungs so //
translated: He says, ‚Äúin general.‚Äù

original: spyi tha mi dad ba'i phyogs la ni 'di thal ba'i sgrub par byed pa ma yin no zhes brjod pa ni /
analyzed: spyi tha mi dad ba'i phyogs la ni 'di thal ba'i sgrub par byed pa ma yin no zhes brjod pa ni /
translated: If the position were that the general is not different, then this would not be a proof by reductio.

original: gzugs la sogs pa nyid ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa nyid ces bya ba'o //
translated: He says, ‚Äúform itself.‚Äù

original: 'di zhes bya ba ni bral ba'i phyir zhes bya ba dang / gsal ba gcig gi mthar thug pa'i phyir zhes bya ba thal ba bsgrub pa ma yin gyis /üîΩ'on kyang khyab pa yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba nyid thal ba'i sgrub par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di zhes bya ba ni bral ba'i phyir zhes bya ba dang / gsal ba gcig gi mthar thug pa'i phyir zhes bya ba thal ba bsgrub pa ma yin gyis / 'on kyang khyab pa yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba nyid thal ba'i sgrub par byed pa yin te /
translated: He says, ‚Äúthis‚Äù because the proof by reductio is not that they are not related or that they are limited to one manifestation.

original: rang gi ngo bo ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: However, the proof by reductio is that they are pervaded, because their nature is not established.

original: 'di sgrub par byed pa @28b ma yin pa ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: 'di sgrub par byed pa @28b ma yin pa ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is this not a proof?

original: de dag khyab pa zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: de dag khyab pa zhes gsungs te /
translated: He says, ‚Äúbecause they are pervaded.‚Äù

original: gzugs la sogs pa gsal ba gcig gi mthar thug pa ni mngon sum gyis grub pa nyid do //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa gsal ba gcig gi mthar thug pa ni mngon sum gyis grub pa nyid do //
translated: The final limit of a single manifestation of form and so on is established by direct perception itself.

original: des na thal ba'i sgrub byed ma yin no //
analyzed: des na thal ba'i sgrub byed ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is not a proof by reductio.

original: de ltar na gnyi ga ltar na yang thal ba'i sgrub par byed pa las ni bsgrub bya 'grub pa ma yin te ;üîΩ'on kyang khyab pa bsgrub pa'i 'bras bu can yin no zhes bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar na gnyi ga ltar na yang thal ba'i sgrub par byed pa las ni bsgrub bya 'grub pa ma yin te ; 'on kyang khyab pa bsgrub pa'i 'bras bu can yin no zhes bstan nas /

original: skabs nye bar sdud pa ni /
analyzed: skabs nye bar sdud pa ni /
translated: Having taught that, he summarizes the point.

original: de'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Therefore, he says.

original: de ltar rang gis mthong ba smos pa'i rnam par gcad par bya ba bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar rang gis mthong ba smos pa'i rnam par gcad par bya ba bstan nas /
translated: Having taught the object of exclusion by mentioning ‚Äúitself sees,‚Äù

analyzed: don smos pa'i rnam par gcad par bya ba bstan pa'i don du phyogs snga ma 'god pa ni /
translated: in order to teach the object of exclusion by mentioning the object, he sets forth the opponent‚Äôs position.

original: gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If, he says.

original: pha rol po don smos pa'i 'bras bu ni de ltar ma yin par yang 'grub po zhes bstan pa'i don du smra ba ni gal te ma grub pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: pha rol po don smos pa'i 'bras bu ni de ltar ma yin par yang 'grub po zhes bstan pa'i don du smra ba ni gal te ma grub pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: In order to teach that the object of the opponent‚Äôs statement is not established in that way, he says, If it is not established, and so on.

original: rtog pas sbyar ba ni gtan tshigs ma yin pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rtog pas sbyar ba ni gtan tshigs ma yin pa ma yin no //
translated: What is the meaning of the statement ‚ÄúA reason is not something that is merely posited by a philosophical theory‚Äù?

original: zhes bya ba'i don to //üîΩci ltar zhe na /üîΩgal te zhes bya ba'o ;üîΩ/'di la ni rtog pas sbyar ba la'o //üîΩrang gi don gyi rjes su dpag pa'i zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i don to // ci ltar zhe na / gal te zhes bya ba'o ; /'di la ni rtog pas sbyar ba la'o // rang gi don gyi rjes su dpag pa'i zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The meaning of the statement is as follows:

original: rjes su dpag par bya ba la tshul gsum pa'i rtags las shes pa gang yin pa zhes bya ba dang / 'brel pa can gyi chos dag las chos can la rtogs pa skye ba gang zhes bya ba rang gi don gyi rjes su dpag pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas /
analyzed: rjes su dpag par bya ba la tshul gsum pa'i rtags las shes pa gang yin pa zhes bya ba dang / 'brel pa can gyi chos dag las chos can la rtogs pa skye ba gang zhes bya ba rang gi don gyi rjes su dpag pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas /
translated: The phrase ‚Äúinferences for oneself‚Äù refers to the definition of an inference for oneself as ‚Äúa cognition that arises from a reason that possesses the trimodal signs in regard to the object that is to be inferred‚Äù or ‚Äúa cognition that arises in regard to a subject from a property that is related to that subject.‚Äù

original: de nyid las rtogs pa tsam gyis bkod pa gtan tshigs yin pa bzlog par 'gyur ro //üîΩtshul gsum pa'i rtags la ma gtogs pa'i don gzhan ni /
analyzed: de nyid las rtogs pa tsam gyis bkod pa gtan tshigs yin pa bzlog par 'gyur ro // tshul gsum pa'i rtags la ma gtogs pa'i don gzhan ni /
translated: Therefore, the statement ‚ÄúA reason is not something that is merely posited by a philosophical theory‚Äù rejects the notion that a reason is merely something that is posited by a philosophical theory.üîΩThe statement ‚ÄúA reason is not something that is a different object than the trimodal signs‚Äù rejects the notion that a reason is something other than the trimodal signs.

original: gzhan gyi don gyi rjes su dpag par brjod pa yang ma yin no zhes brjod par ni gzhan gyi zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyi don gyi rjes su dpag par brjod pa yang ma yin no zhes brjod par ni gzhan gyi zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The statement ‚ÄúA reason is not something that is expressed in an inference for another‚Äù rejects the notion that a reason is something that is expressed in an inference for another.

original: 'dir zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi don gyi rjes su dpag par ro //üîΩder yang zhes bya ba ni rang don du'o //
analyzed: 'dir zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi don gyi rjes su dpag par ro // der yang zhes bya ba ni rang don du'o //
translated: Here means in the inference for the sake of others.üîΩThere also means in the inference for one's own sake.

original: de nyid du zhes bya ba ni rang don rjes dpag nyid du'o //
analyzed: de nyid du zhes bya ba ni rang don rjes dpag nyid du'o //
translated: Just there means in the inference for one's own sake.

original: yang na dgos pa'i khyad par yod pa'i phyir 'di nyid du don smos par bya ba yin no zhes brjod pa ni 'dir byas pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: yang na dgos pa'i khyad par yod pa'i phyir 'di nyid du don smos par bya ba yin no zhes brjod pa ni 'dir byas pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Or else, because there is a special purpose, the meaning is stated here itself. This is what is said: here, the word made is used.

original: rang gi don du zhes bya ba ni rang gi don gyi rjes dpag tu'o //
analyzed: rang gi don du zhes bya ba ni rang gi don gyi rjes dpag tu'o //
translated: For one's own sake means in the inference for one's own sake.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: su yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: su yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: No one means no one at all.

original: rtog pa sngon du byed pa ni rang rtogs pa'i don du dngos po ma yin pa'i rtags su rjes su 'brang ba ni med do //
analyzed: rtog pa sngon du byed pa ni rang rtogs pa'i don du dngos po ma yin pa'i rtags su rjes su 'brang ba ni med do //
translated: One who acts with prior conceptualization does not follow a reason that is not an entity for the sake of understanding oneself.

original: gzhan kho na bla'i bdag nyid ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan kho na bla'i bdag nyid ni ma yin no //
translated: It is only for others, not for oneself.

original: 'dir zhes bya ba ni gzhan don rjes dpag tu'o //
analyzed: 'dir zhes bya ba ni gzhan don rjes dpag tu'o //
translated: Here means in the inference for the sake of others.

original: gal te @29a * //
analyzed: gal te @29a * //
translated: If one were to say:

original: gang gis don smos pas gsal bar bya ba rtog pas sgro btags pa gtan tshigs yin na ci nyes she na /
analyzed: gang gis don smos pas gsal bar bya ba rtog pas sgro btags pa gtan tshigs yin na ci nyes she na /
translated: What is wrong with a reason that is a conceptual superimposition, which clarifies the meaning by mentioning it?

original: don dam par ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: don dam par ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is said, ultimately.

original: rtog pas sgro btags pa'i gtan tshigs ni phyogs dang phyogs gang yang rung ba nyid la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rtog pas sgro btags pa'i gtan tshigs ni phyogs dang phyogs gang yang rung ba nyid la sogs pa'o //
translated: A reason that is a conceptual superimposition is like the subject and the property to be proven being the same.

original: dngos po'ang gzhan du srid pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa dang dngos po mi mthun par yang 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos po'ang gzhan du srid pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa dang dngos po mi mthun par yang 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: And because it is possible that the thing is different, it is also possible that the meaning and the words are not in agreement.

original: rtags dang phyogs dang mthun phyogs gang rung nyid la sogs pa ni 'khrul pa kho na'o //
analyzed: rtags dang phyogs dang mthun phyogs gang rung nyid la sogs pa ni 'khrul pa kho na'o //
translated: The reason, subject, and similar instances are all just mistaken.

original: de nyid kyis ni don smos pa nyid kyis so //
analyzed: de nyid kyis ni don smos pa nyid kyis so //
translated: By that alone means by mentioning the meaning alone.

original: don smos pa med na ni ma 'brel pa yang rtags yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: don smos pa med na ni ma 'brel pa yang rtags yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: If the meaning is not mentioned, then even an unrelated thing can be a reason.

original: gal te slob dpon phyogs kyi glang po'i gzhung la 'brel pa ston par byed pa yod pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te slob dpon phyogs kyi glang po'i gzhung la 'brel pa ston par byed pa yod pa ma yin nam /
translated: If it is asked, Isn't there a connection shown in the treatise of Master Dignaga?

original: de nyid ci ltar 'di nyid kyis 'brel pa 'phen zhes brjod ce na /
analyzed: de nyid ci ltar 'di nyid kyis 'brel pa 'phen zhes brjod ce na /
translated: Why is it said, How does that alone imply this connection?

original: gang du yang zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: gang du yang zhes gsungs so //
translated: ‚Äú Anywhere‚Äù is stated.

original: gang gis don smos par 'di gsal bar bya ba ci ltar 'di ma nges pa yin snyam na /
analyzed: gang gis don smos par 'di gsal bar bya ba ci ltar 'di ma nges pa yin snyam na /
translated: If one thinks, ‚ÄúWhat is the purpose of stating this? How is this not indefinite?‚Äù

original: phyogs dang zhes gsungs so ;
analyzed: phyogs dang zhes gsungs so ;
translated: ‚Äú Direction‚Äù is stated.

original: / ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: / ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: gang dang zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gang dang zhes bya ba ni /
translated: ‚Äú That which is‚Äù is stated.

original: 'di snyam du phyogs dang mthun pa'i phyogs gang yang rung ba'i phyir zhes bya ba'i don sgra dang bum pa'i mi rtag pa nyid kyi spyi la mi mi 'khrul pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni mi 'dod kyi /
analyzed: 'di snyam du phyogs dang mthun pa'i phyogs gang yang rung ba'i phyir zhes bya ba'i don sgra dang bum pa'i mi rtag pa nyid kyi spyi la mi mi 'khrul pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni mi 'dod kyi /
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúthat which is‚Äù is not asserted to be ‚Äúbecause of the direction and the opposite direction, the meaning of ‚Äòany‚Äô is because of possessing a non-erroneous quality in the generality of impermanence of sound and pot.‚Äù

original: 'on kyang phyogs su byas pa cig shos nyid du'o //üîΩphyogs su byas pa'i cig shos nyid ces bya ba gang yang rung ba nyid de /
analyzed: 'on kyang phyogs su byas pa cig shos nyid du'o // phyogs su byas pa'i cig shos nyid ces bya ba gang yang rung ba nyid de /
translated: However, it is the opposite of that which is taken as the direction.üîΩThe opposite of that which is taken as the direction is ‚Äúany.‚Äù

original: cig shos kyi sgras ni phyogs su byas pa nyid brjod par 'dod pa yin no //
analyzed: cig shos kyi sgras ni phyogs su byas pa nyid brjod par 'dod pa yin no //
translated: The word ‚Äúthat‚Äù is asserted to express that which is taken as the direction.

original: des na brjod ma thag pa'i nyes par mi 'gyur ro zhes sems pa'o //
analyzed: des na brjod ma thag pa'i nyes par mi 'gyur ro zhes sems pa'o //
translated: Therefore, the fault just mentioned does not occur.

original: de tsam gyis zhes bya ba ni mi rtag pa nyid du brjod par 'dod pa tsam gyis so //
analyzed: de tsam gyis zhes bya ba ni mi rtag pa nyid du brjod par 'dod pa tsam gyis so //
translated: ‚ÄúBy that alone‚Äù means by the mere desire to express impermanence.

original: ci'i phyir mi 'grub snyam  na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir mi 'grub snyam  na /
translated: If one asks why it is not established,

original: rtag pa nyid du brjod par 'dod na mi rtag pa nyid med par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtag pa nyid du brjod par 'dod na mi rtag pa nyid med par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: it is because if one desires to express permanence, impermanence would not exist.

original: 'on te dngos po la mi rtag pa nyid kyi phyogs su 'grub pa des na rtag pa nyid du brjod par 'dod kyang de med par mi 'gyur ro zhes dogs na gal te dngos po la zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'on te dngos po la mi rtag pa nyid kyi phyogs su 'grub pa des na rtag pa nyid du brjod par 'dod kyang de med par mi 'gyur ro zhes dogs na gal te dngos po la zhes bya ba'o //
translated: But if one thinks that by establishing impermanence in a thing, even though one desires to express permanence, it would not be nonexistent, then there is the response beginning with ‚ÄúIf it is in a thing.

original: sgrub par byed pa ni grub pas bsgrub bya bsgrub par nus pa ma yin no //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa ni grub pas bsgrub bya bsgrub par nus pa ma yin no //
translated: ‚Äù A proof is not able to establish the probandum by being established.

original: des na gal te mi rtag pa nyid kyi phyogs nyid yin pa dngos po'i sgrub par byed pa grub par gyur na /
analyzed: des na gal te mi rtag pa nyid kyi phyogs nyid yin pa dngos po'i sgrub par byed pa grub par gyur na /
translated: Therefore, if the proof of a thing is established as just the side of impermanence,

original: de'i tshe sgra ni mi rtag pa'i phyir na mi rtag pa yin no zhes bya ba grub pa la sgrub pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i tshe sgra ni mi rtag pa'i phyir na mi rtag pa yin no zhes bya ba grub pa la sgrub pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: then at that time, because sound is impermanent, it would be a proof of what is already established.

original: de ltar ni rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de ltar ni rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: That is not logical.

original: @29b des na phyogs su byas pa gzhan nyid du brjod par 'dod pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs kyi don ma yin no //
analyzed: @29b des na phyogs su byas pa gzhan nyid du brjod par 'dod pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs kyi don ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, ‚Äúbecause it is asserted to be different from the position‚Äù is not the meaning of the reason.

original: skabs nye bar sdud pa ni de'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: skabs nye bar sdud pa ni de'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The summary of the section is ‚ÄúTherefore . . . ‚Äù

original: gal te de ltar na rang gis mthong ba'i don sgrub par byed par 'gyur mod /
analyzed: gal te de ltar na rang gis mthong ba'i don sgrub par byed par 'gyur mod /
translated: If that is so, then it would be establishing the object that is seen by oneself.

original: tshul gsum ba kho na yin no zhes bya ba ni ga las she na /
analyzed: tshul gsum ba kho na yin no zhes bya ba ni ga las she na /
translated: ‚ÄúIt is only the triply characterized‚Äù is said. Why is that?

original: rang la zhes bya ba ste gzhan ni sgrub par byed pa nyid du mi rung ba'i phyir ro zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: rang la zhes bya ba ste gzhan ni sgrub par byed pa nyid du mi rung ba'i phyir ro zhes dgongs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúFor oneself‚Äù means that it is not suitable for another to be the proof.

original: des na zhes bya ba ni tshul gsum pa'i rtags ston pa gzhan gyi don gyi rjes su dpag pa yin pas na'o //
analyzed: des na zhes bya ba ni tshul gsum pa'i rtags ston pa gzhan gyi don gyi rjes su dpag pa yin pas na'o //
translated: ‚ÄúTherefore‚Äù means because the triply characterized reason is the other‚Äôs purpose in inference.

original: de ni zhes bya ba phyags ni ma grub pas kyang bsgrub bya ci ste mi 'grub snyam na /
analyzed: de ni zhes bya ba phyags ni ma grub pas kyang bsgrub bya ci ste mi 'grub snyam na /
translated: ‚ÄúThat‚Äù is the opponent. If it is not established, why is the probandum not established?

original: bsgrub bya zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: bsgrub bya zhes gsungs so //
translated: ‚ÄúThe probandum‚Äù is stated.

original: bsgrub bya nyid ni bsgrub bya sgrub par byed byed pa ma yin no zhes 'brel to //
analyzed: bsgrub bya nyid ni bsgrub bya sgrub par byed byed pa ma yin no zhes 'brel to //
translated: The probandum is not the proof of the probandum.

original: tshig ces bya ba ni dam bca' ba'i tshig go //
analyzed: tshig ces bya ba ni dam bca' ba'i tshig go //
translated: The ‚Äúwords‚Äù are the words of the thesis.

original: bsgrub bya ma grub kyang tshig grub pa'i phyir sgrub par byed pa yin no zhes bsam pa'o //
analyzed: bsgrub bya ma grub kyang tshig grub pa'i phyir sgrub par byed pa yin no zhes bsam pa'o //
translated: The idea is that even if the probandum is not established, the words are established, and so the words are the proof.

original: 'gog pa ni tshig ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'gog pa ni tshig ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The ‚Äúwords‚Äù are the words of the refutation.

original: ci'i phyir 'brel pa med snyam na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir 'brel pa med snyam na /
translated: Why are they unrelated?

original: tshig gis zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: tshig gis zhes gsungs so //
translated: The words are unrelated.

original: gang zhig don tsam dang yang ma 'brel pa de bsgrub par bya ba'i don dang gal 'brel zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gang zhig don tsam dang yang ma 'brel pa de bsgrub par bya ba'i don dang gal 'brel zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The idea is that the words are unrelated to the mere object, but they are related to the object that is the probandum.

original: de'i phyir ni ma 'brel ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir ni ma 'brel ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Therefore, because they are unrelated.

original: sgra ni mi rtag ste byas pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tshig 'di la /
analyzed: sgra ni mi rtag ste byas pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tshig 'di la /
translated: The words ‚ÄúSound is impermanent because it is produced‚Äù

original: tshul gsum dang ldan pa'i byas pa nyid rtags yin pas bsgrub par bya ba mi rtag pa nyid go bar byed pa yin te /
analyzed: tshul gsum dang ldan pa'i byas pa nyid rtags yin pas bsgrub par bya ba mi rtag pa nyid go bar byed pa yin te /
translated: are the evidence, which is the property of the subject, because it is the reason. Therefore, the words make known the probandum, impermanence.

original: tshul gsum pa'i byas pa de mi rtag pa de la mi 'khrul pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshul gsum pa'i byas pa de mi rtag pa de la mi 'khrul pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because the production that is the property of the subject is not mistaken with regard to impermanence.

original: nges par gzung ba'i rnam par gcad pa brjod pa ni phyogs kyi tshig gis zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: nges par gzung ba'i rnam par gcad pa brjod pa ni phyogs kyi tshig gis zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The expression of the exclusion of the ascertainment is the word ‚Äúonly.‚Äù

original: de lta ma yin na zhes bya ba'i tshig go bar byed pa yin na'o //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na zhes bya ba'i tshig go bar byed pa yin na'o //
translated: If it were not so, the word ‚Äúonly‚Äù would be a clarifier.

original: de'i zhes bya ba gtan tshigs kyi tshig gi don gzhal bya ba nyid mi rtag pa nyid der ma 'brel pa'i phyir gzhal bya nyid gtan tshigs ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i zhes bya ba gtan tshigs kyi tshig gi don gzhal bya ba nyid mi rtag pa nyid der ma 'brel pa'i phyir gzhal bya nyid gtan tshigs ma yin no //
translated: ‚Äú That‚Äù is the meaning of the word of the reason. Since the object of cognition is not related to impermanence, the object of cognition is not the reason.

original: 'on te dam bcas pa tsam ni zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi'o //
analyzed: 'on te dam bcas pa tsam ni zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi'o //
translated: ‚Äú If it is merely the thesis‚Äù is the opponent‚Äôs position.

original: lan ni ci ltar dam bcas pa'i tshig sgrub par byed pa ma yin pa sgrub par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: lan ni ci ltar dam bcas pa'i tshig sgrub par byed pa ma yin pa sgrub par byed pa yin te /
translated: The reply is: ‚ÄúHow is it that the statement of the thesis is not the proof? It is the proof,

original: gtan tshigs nyid du nye bar bkod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gtan tshigs nyid du nye bar bkod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the statement of the reason.‚Äù

original: lhan cig pa ste gtan tshigs kyi tshig dang bcas pa sgrub par byed pa yin gyi 'ba' zhig ni ma yin te /
analyzed: lhan cig pa ste gtan tshigs kyi tshig dang bcas pa sgrub par byed pa yin gyi 'ba' zhig ni ma yin te /
translated: It is the proof when it is together with the word of the reason, not by itself.

original: dper na sa bon dang bcas pa myu gu'i sgrub par byed pa yin pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na sa bon dang bcas pa myu gu'i sgrub par byed pa yin pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, the seed is the proof of the sprout when it is together with the sprout, not by itself.

original: mkho ba med pa zhes bya ba ni phyogs kyi tshig ste ma 'brel pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mkho ba med pa zhes bya ba ni phyogs kyi tshig ste ma 'brel pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The term ‚Äúunrelated‚Äù is a term of direction, because it is not connected.

original: @30a * // ci ltar na bsgrub par bya ba grub pa'i don du gtan tshigs kyi tshig dang lhan cig tu byed /
analyzed: @30a * // ci ltar na bsgrub par bya ba grub pa'i don du gtan tshigs kyi tshig dang lhan cig tu byed /
translated: How can the statement of the reason be used to establish the probandum?

original: gtan tshigs kyi tshig kyang phyogs kyi tshig dang lhan cig tu ci ltar byed /
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyi tshig kyang phyogs kyi tshig dang lhan cig tu ci ltar byed /
translated: And how can the statement of the reason be used together with the statement of the direction?

original: rdo'i du ma bu ni myu gu bskyed pa'i don du chu la sogs pas lhan cig par ltos par bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: rdo'i du ma bu ni myu gu bskyed pa'i don du chu la sogs pas lhan cig par ltos par bya ba ma yin no //
translated: A stone, for example, is not something that should be relied on together with water, etc., for the sake of producing a sprout.

original: ltos na yang myu gu'i skyed byed du 'gyur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: ltos na yang myu gu'i skyed byed du 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: Even if it were relied on, it would not be a producer of the sprout.

original: dngos po la ci'i phyir tshad ma ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: dngos po la ci'i phyir tshad ma ma yin zhe na /
translated: Why is it not a valid means of knowledge with regard to things?

original: de las the tshom dag ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: de las the tshom dag ces bya ba'o //
translated: Because of doubt from that.

original: der zhes bya ba ni don la'o //
analyzed: der zhes bya ba ni don la'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThere‚Äù means with regard to the object.

original: de lta ma yin na zhes bya ba ni dam bca' ba'i tshig don dang ma 'brel na'o //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na zhes bya ba ni dam bca' ba'i tshig don dang ma 'brel na'o //
translated: ‚ÄúOtherwise‚Äù means if the statement of the thesis were not connected with the object.

original: 'o na zhes bya ba nas ce'i bar ni gzhan gyi'o //
analyzed: 'o na zhes bya ba nas ce'i bar ni gzhan gyi'o //
translated: ‚ÄúWell then‚Äù up to ‚Äúwhat?‚Äù is by the opponent.

original: de las zhes bya ba ni tshig las so //
analyzed: de las zhes bya ba ni tshig las so //
translated: ‚ÄúFrom that‚Äù means from the statement.

original: der yang ni sgrub par byed pa la yang tshig de 'brel pa med pa nyid do //
analyzed: der yang ni sgrub par byed pa la yang tshig de 'brel pa med pa nyid do //
translated: And even in the proof, the word is not related.

original: 'brel pa yin na ni zhes bya ba ni gal te de sgrub par byed pa la 'brel na'o //
analyzed: 'brel pa yin na ni zhes bya ba ni gal te de sgrub par byed pa la 'brel na'o //
translated: If it is related, that is, if it is related to the proof,

original: de'i tshe bsgrub par bya ba dang 'brel pa gang gis zlog par byed de 'gal ba med pa kho na'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe bsgrub par bya ba dang 'brel pa gang gis zlog par byed de 'gal ba med pa kho na'o //
translated: then at that time, by what relation is the probandum related? There is no contradiction.

original: dam bca'i tshig 'bras bu dang bcas pa ston pa ni sgrub par byed pa la yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dam bca'i tshig 'bras bu dang bcas pa ston pa ni sgrub par byed pa la yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The statement of the thesis with its result is ‚Äúeven in the proof.‚Äù

original: der ni zhes bya ba ni sgrub par byed pa du ma la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: der ni zhes bya ba ni sgrub par byed pa du ma la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThere‚Äù refers to the many proofs, etc.

original: 'o na khyab par brjod pa yang don med do zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na khyab par brjod pa yang don med do zhe na /
translated: But then the statement of the pervasion is also meaningless.

original: tshig gis ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: tshig gis ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúBy the word‚Äù means

original: sngon zhugs pa'i tshad ma de la'o //
analyzed: sngon zhugs pa'i tshad ma de la'o //
translated: in that previously stated valid cognition.

original: de la tshig gis zhes bya ba ni mngon sum gyis grub pa'i sgrub par byed pa la'o //
analyzed: de la tshig gis zhes bya ba ni mngon sum gyis grub pa'i sgrub par byed pa la'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThere‚Äù means in the proof established by direct perception.

original: de'i phyir na tshig gis sgrub par byed pa'i tshad ma ni 'phen pa ma yin pa'i phyir na bsgrub par bya ba la yang tshig gi tshad ma 'phen par gal 'gyur /

analyzed: ci'i phyir sgrub bar byed pa ma yin snyam na /

analyzed: 'di nyid bsal bar byed pa ni bsgrub bya'i don la zhes bya ba'o //

analyzed: ci skad brjod pa de zhe na /

analyzed: gzhan don dang zhes bya ba'o //

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /

original: ston par byed pa la ni zhes smos so //
analyzed: ston par byed pa la ni zhes smos so //

original: de'i zhes smos so //
analyzed: de'i zhes smos so //

analyzed: des na de la ltos nas ni tshig rjes su dpag pa ma yin mod kyi gzhan gyi don du ni 'gyur ba kho na'o //

analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi'o // de nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba ni grub pa'i mtha'o //

analyzed: de lta ma yin na zhes bya ba ni tshig tshad ma nyid yin na'o //

original: de las ni tshig las so //
analyzed: de las ni tshig las so //

analyzed: tshad mar gyur pa'i tshig las ni tshad mar gyur pa'i shes pa kho na skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bstan to //

analyzed: ldog pa brjod pa ni dran pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'o //

original: don dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rtsod pa'o //
analyzed: don dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rtsod pa'o //
translated: The expression ‚Äúwith respect to the object‚Äù and so on is an objection.

analyzed: don dang ma 'brel ba'i phyir tshig de las dran pa de nyid ci ltar 'byung /

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /

analyzed: du ba ni zhes smos so //
translated: The expression ‚Äúbecause smoke‚Äù is a statement of the reason.

analyzed: gtan tshigs 'di ma nges pa yin no zhes bstan pa'i don du de ni ma yin te zhes gsungs so // 'brel pa la dran pa tsam mam /
translated: In order to show that this reason is inconclusive, he says, ‚ÄúThat is not so.‚ÄùüîΩEither memory alone or

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /

analyzed: dran pa yang zhes bya ba'o //

analyzed: da ltar ba'i don med kyang 'bad rtsol yod pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: gal te rtags las bzhin du sgra las kyang nges par ci ste mi 'dod snyam na /
